Saturn Cloud provides a data science platform that features a parallel computing library, Dask, as its flagship product and offers teams collaboration, scalable compute resources, and analytics.

Nextjournal operates as a web-based platform. It focuses on enhancing reproducibility and collaboration in research. It offers a notebook-style programming environment to support multiple languages and provides features like automatic versioning, real-time collaboration, and on-demand provisioning with graphics processing unit (GPU) support. The platform primarily caters to the needs of machine learning researchers, data scientists, educators, and scientists seeking to share reproducible research and analyses. It is based in Berlin, Germany.

Deepnote is building a data science notebook for teams. In the notebook, users can connect their data, explore, and analyze it. Users can easily share project links with team collaborators, or with end-users to present polished assets. All of this is done through a simple, browser-based UI that runs in the cloud.
Binder is a cloud-based platform that aims to empower high-growth companies to attract, identify, qualify, and hire entry-level talent.
Noteable develops a collaborative notebook experience that eliminates the barriers between data analytics and data science teams.
Curvenote is a collaborative writing environment for scientific content, with integrations to Jupyter.

Count develops a data platform that provides early-stage teams with tools to build data pipelines. It provides solutions for ad hoc analysis, data transformation, problem-solving, and reporting. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in London, U.K.

Altair empowers client development and decision-making through technology that optimizes the analysis, management, and visualization of business and engineering information. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Troy, Michigan.

Anaconda is a python data science platform and its flagship product, Anaconda Enterprise, allows organizations to secure, govern, scale, and extend Anaconda to deliver insights that drive businesses and industries forward.

RapidMiner is a data analytics and machine learning software provider. It is a predictive analytics platform, that provides solutions for a variety of industries. The platform is used by business analysts. RapidMiner was formerly known as Rapid-I. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts. In September 2022, RapidMiner was acquired by Altair. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

MathWorks develops mathematical computing software, MATLAB and Simulink. Engineers and scientists worldwide rely on its products to accelerate the pace of discovery and development of ideas and solutions to challenging problems.

KNIME specializes in data mining, business intelligence, data analysis, data integration, predictive models, statistics, workflow tool, reporting, data science and machine learning. It is based in Zurich, Switzerland.
Aible has developed an AI software that offers services including data cleansing, feature creation, model training, data scoring, model deployment and quantifying impact to help business users.

Qwak specializes in machine learning operations (MLOps) solutions. The company offers a managed platform that allows users to transform and store data, build, train, and deploy machine learning models, and monitor the entire machine learning pipeline. It primarily serves organizations that are driven by machine learning. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

DataRobot offers an enterprise machine learning platform that empowers users of all skill levels to make better predictions faster. Incorporating a library of hundreds of open-source machine learning algorithms, the DataRobot platform automates, trains, and evaluates predictive models in parallel, delivering more accurate predictions at scale.

Abacus.AI helps enterprises make better use of AI by empowering developers to build custom models from data sets. It provides deep learning techniques to create custom models or plug and play models on its ML infrastructure. Abacus.AI has support for all aspects of the ML lifecycle including data pipelines, data wrangling, online feature store, model training, hosting, and monitoring drift.

Dataiku is a late-stage technology firm that develops a centralized data platform that democratizes the use of data science, machine learning, and AI in the enterprise. Dataiku helps businesses move along their data journey from data preparation to analytics at scale to enterprise AI by providing a common ground for data experts and explorers, a repository of best practices, shortcuts to machine learning and AI deployment/management, and a centralized, controlled environment. The firm primarily serves the retail, financial, pharmaceutical, and manufacturing industries. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

Dataloop provides an enterprise-grade data platform for vision artificial intelligence (AI) systems in development and production. It specializes in high-volume and complex data and helps a wide range of deep-learning teams automate their data preparation processes. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Herzliya, Israel.

H2O.ai is an AI company that makes machine learning accessible to corporates and allows business users to extract key information from data, without needing prior knowledge in deploying or tuning machine learning model, with key deployments in financial services, insurance, healthcare, among other industries. The firm was founded in 2011 and is based in Mountain View, California.

Snorkel AI is the developer of a system for programmatically building and managing training datasets. The company's platform allows users to develop training datasets. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Redwood City, California.

Domino is a workbench that accelerates the entire analytical lifecycle, from early exploratory work all the way to deploying your models, allowing users to track and share work along the way. It works alongside the tools and languages already used, including R, Python, Julia and more. Domino Data Lab was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Modular offers a platform that unifies popular AI framework frontends via modular, composable common components. The company aims to let developers plug in custom hardware to train AI systems and deploy those systems to edge devices or servers. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.
Continual brings operational AI to the modern, warehouse-centric data stack. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Scale AI is an API for human labor that allows developers to enter requests for humans to complete menial, repetitive tasks that cannot be done by a computer. With Scale, developers can get information screened for duplicates and mismatches and have user-generated content moderated and categorized.

causaLens builds Causal AI-powered products that are trusted by organizations across a wide range of industries. Its No-Code Causal AI Platform empowers all types of users to make decisions through an intuitive user interface.

dotData provides an end-to-end data science automation platform that accelerates, democratizes, and operationalizes the entire data science process with artificial intelligence/machine learning. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Mateo, California.

CentML offers an optimization platform for ML Training. By utilizing CentML's platform, clients can save significantly save on training costs for small and gigantic models. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

Palantir Technologies (NYSE: PLTR) offers a suite of software applications for integrating, visualizing and analyzing the world's information, supporting datasets including structured, unstructured, relational, temporal and geospatial. Palantir's products are built for real analysis with a focus on security, scalability, ease of use and collaboration. The products are broadly deployed in the intelligence, defense, law enforcement and financial communities.

Graft is a cloud-native platform that empowers organizations to wield advanced AI techniques to unlock the value of text, images, video, audio, and graphs. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Obviously AI helps users integrate their workflow by connecting data sources. Its platform allows users to run machine learning predictions and analytics. Obviously AI aims to forego coding required for machine learning and analytics to drive productivity.

Amazon Mechanical Turk (MTurk) is a crowdsourcing marketplace that makes it easier for individuals and businesses to outsource their processes and jobs to a distributed workforce who can perform these tasks virtually. The company is based in Seattle, Washington.

Hazy provides an artificial intelligence (AI) platform. It uses machine learning and AI to provide synthetic data to increase data privacy. It serves financial institutions globally. It was formally known as Anon AI. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

Sama provides accurate data for ambitious AI. Its training data platform develops accurate machine learning models specializing in image, video, and sensor data annotation and validation for machine learning algorithms in industries including transportation, retail and e-commerce, consumer and media, MedTech, manufacturing and robotics, and agriculture. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in San Francisco, California.

HumanSignal develops an open-source data labeling platform. The company provides a product Label Studio, that automates the labelling with any datasets. HumanSignal was formerly known as Heartex. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.
Upwork is a freelance talent marketplace that enables businesses with more access to quality talent.

SuperAnnotate AI develops an end-to-end platform to annotate, train, and automate AI. The company designs AI-powered image and video annotation software solutions for industries. It serves clients in the Agriculture, Autonomous Driving, Robotics, Aerial Imagery, NLP, Healthcare, Sports, Insurance, and Security industries. SuperAnnotate was founded in 2018 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

V7 provides artificial intelligence (AI) computer vision. The platform offers image annotation, dataset management, model management and more solutions. It operates in agriculture, automotive, construction, energy, food and beverage, government, healthcare and more. The company's Aipoly offers an app for the blind and visually impaired. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in London, U.K.

Voxel51 is an AI software company that specializes in machine learning and computer vision within the technology sector. The company provides open source computer vision tools that allow machine learning engineers to rapidly curate and experiment with their datasets, thereby facilitating the development of higher performing machine learning systems. Voxel51 primarily serves sectors such as agriculture, aviation, driving, healthcare, manufacturing, retail, and security. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Ann Arbor, Michigan.

Labelbox develops a training data platform for machine learning teams to build real-world artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The platform consists of label editor tools for batch, and real-time labeling workflows, collaboration, quality review, analytics, and more. It serves the government, retail, insurance, manufacturing, and healthcare sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is located in San Francisco, California.

DatGen Technologies is a data-as-a-service (DaaS) platform, creating customized, photorealistic, synthetic visual data to train neural networks. Has applications in virtual reality, augmented reality, drones, security, and autonomous vehicles.

CloudFactory creates economic and leadership opportunities for talented people in developing nations. It is a distributed labor platform offering human and machine intelligence. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Reading, U.K.

Hive provides cloud-based enterprise AI solutions that help companies use AI to interpret video, image, audio, and text. The company offers end-to-end AI services, including pre-trained AI models served via API and a suite of enterprise applications. Hive's technology enables use cases that includes automated content moderation, brand protection and platform integrity, content-based ad targeting, advertising and sponsorship measurement, and more. The company serves the automotive & transportation, financial services & insurance, media & entertainment, communications, manufacturing, travel, retail, restaurants, and utilities industries. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Alegion is a data labeling solution for enterprise-grade Machine Learning. The company's services include streaming, high-resolution, high-density video annotation, and delivering accurately-annotated, model-ready data to train and validate ML models. Alegion provides both the platform and workforce to operate with quality at scale, processing structured and unstructured data including video, image, audio, and text. The platform supports complex use cases, powered by robust ontologies and entity relationships. Alegion was founded in 2012 and is based in Austin, Texas.
Kili Technology is an image, video, and text annotation tool that speeds up training sets annotation. It is based in Paris, France.

Refuel.AI owns and operates an online platform. It generates, annotates, cleans, and enriches datasets for artificial intelligence (AI) needs and allows users to search and analyze. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Unity (NYSE: U) develops a 3D development platform, giving developers around the world the tools to create interactive 2D, 3D, VR, and AR experiences. It offers software solutions to create, run, and monetize 2D and 3D content for mobile phones, tablets, PCs, consoles, and augmented and virtual reality devices. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Super.AI develops an AI enablement platform that accelerates machine learning projects by using AI and humans to generate, structure, and label any type of data. The firm's products include unstructured data processing, intelligent document processing, Super.Redact, Super.Classify, Super.Extract, and Super.Answer. Super.AI primarily serves the financial services, insurance, and retail industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bellevue, Washington.
Gretel develops software that enables developers and engineers to access and share anonymized data for developing applications.

Appen is a global provider in speech and search technology services. With expertise in more than 150 languages, Appen partners with technology and ecommerce companies as they develop new offerings and expand them to global markets. The company's solutions help companies create engaging products with accurate speech interfaces and relevant content ranging from web sites, to maps, images, and merchandise.

Defined.ai provides a range of pre-collected and structured training datasets, including text, voice, and image data, and hosts an online marketplace where these datasets can be bought, sold, or commissioned. Defined.ai caters to the AI development sector, providing data that aids in the creation of fair, accessible, and ethical AI solutions. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

Tonic.ai automatically creates mock data that preserves characteristics of secure datasets so that developers, data scientists, and salespeople can work without breaching privacy. It offers data that is modeled from a client's production data to help tell an identical story in the client's testing environments. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Mostly AI develops and offers a synthetic data engine that provides organizations the ability to generate realistic and representative synthetic users and data, retaining structure and variation while preserving privacy. The company serves the banking, insurance and telecommunications industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

Datasaur develops smart tools to help make natural language processing (NLP) labeling productive. It offers a platform that collaborate and its built-in intelligence catches errors by flagging inconsistent labels. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Livermore, California.

Superb AI uses AI to customize training data for large tech companies. The company's Superb AI Suite is an enterprise SaaS platform built to help ML engineers, product teams, researchers, and data annotators create efficient training data workflows through its filter and search, auto-labeling AI, and ML Ops integration solutions. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Mateo, California.

Weights & Biases provides a developer-first MLOps platform that offers performance visualization tools for machine learning. Weights & Biases customers are developers. Weights & Biases was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Features & Labels is the operator of a machine learning infrastructure intended to simplify deployment. The company provides services to deploy machine learning models and remove complex data pipelines, increasing the speed of work done and thereby enabling data scientists to focus on problem-solving. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Emeryville, California.

Verta builds software infrastructure to help enterprise data science and machine learning (ML) teams rapidly develop and deploy ML models. The Verta platform builds upon research at MIT CSAIL on ModelDB, an open-source model management system used at Fortune 500 companies. Verta's technology extends ModelDB to support the entire modeling lifecycle including model training, deployment, and governance.

Seldon Technologies accelerates the adoption of machine learning to solve challenging problems. The company democratizes technologies that were once the preserve of tech giants  and putting them in everyone's hands.

MindsDB develops an open-source applied machine learning (ML) platform that enables developers to create AI-centered applications for living and working. The company offers to retrain models, BI tools, data transformation, and more. MindsDB was founded in 2017 and is based in San Jose, California.

Modzy provides a secure ModelOps AI enterprise platform to discover, deploy, manage and govern AI at scale. The platform offers a rapid deploy-anywhere approach and a model marketplace with vetted and pre-trained models from AI companies. Modzy includes explainability to increase AI trust levels and adversarial defense for resilience against data poisoning and other threats.
ZenML provides an extensible and open source MLOps framework to accelerate and simplify the delivery of machine learning models, and research and production.
Iterative offers DVC.org as an open source tool for data and models versioning for ML projects.

Tecton offers a fully-managed ML feature platform that orchestrates the complete lifecycle of features, from transformation to online serving, with enterprise-grade SLAs. Its platform can also monitor data pipelines, calculate the latency and processing costs, and retrieve historical features to train systems in production. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Deci AI enables deep learning to live up to its true potential by using AI to build better AI. With the companys end-to-end deep learning acceleration platform, AI developers can build, optimize, and deploy faster and more accurate models for any environment including cloud, edge, and mobile, allowing them to transform industries with world-changing products. The platform is powered by Decis AutoNAC (Automated Neural Architecture Construction) technology, an algorithmic optimization engine that squeezes maximum utilization out of any hardware without compromising on accuracy. Deci was founded in 2019 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

FeatureByte focuses on artificial intelligence (AI) feature engineering and management. The company offers a self-service platform to simplify the entire AI feature lifecycle, enabling data scientists and machine learning engineers to create and deploy fully governed, production-ready pipelines from raw data in a significantly reduced timeframe. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Shrewsbury, Massachusetts.
Modelbit creates software to help data scientists deploy ML models from Jupyter notebooks with one line of code.

AI Squared offers a low-code platform designed to help companies adopt artificial intelligence and integrate it into existing applications in a timely and straightforward manner. The platform is used by data science, business, and IT teams. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Washington, DC.

Galileo builds a data intelligence toolchain for machine learning developers working with unstructured data. It streamlines Artificial intelligence (AI) development pipelines across teams using auto-loggers and algorithms to deal with system-breaking issues and deploys it in on-premises environments for Natural Language Processing (NLP) practitioners. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Feast is an open-source feature store that focuses on the machine learning industry. The company provides a platform for organizations to store and serve features consistently for offline training and online inference. Primarily, Feast caters to sectors involved in machine learning applications. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

Comet provides a self-hosted and cloud-based meta-machine learning platform allowing data scientists and teams to track, compare, explain, and optimize experiments and models. Comet was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

Valohai is a SaaS platform that allows international companies to accelerate machine learning development and scale their model deployment. The scalable solution allows companies to run multiple variations of machine learning ideas in parallel, leaving developers free to focus on pushing the boundaries of their research with minimal idle time. The platform, which requires no setup, meaning companies can start building large-scale ML models immediately, is designed to be used for peer review and open-source collaboration. The Valohai system can track changes, build reproducible algorithms, and ensure changes in team composition do not hinder the experiment process.

The Hopsworks Feature Store provides an open ecosystem that connects to the largest number of data storage, data pipelines, and data science platforms. The company specializes in Hadoop, distributed systems, Spark, Tensorflow and more. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

XetHub focuses on enhancing collaboration among machine learning teams operating in the technology and data management sectors. The company provides a version-controlled blob store that allows machine learning practitioners to access and collaborate on large-scale models and data, simplifying the machine learning development process. XetHub primarily serves the technology and data science industries. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Seattle, Washington.
Datatron's real-time big data AI engine is complete with proprietary software that allows for enterprises to optimize real-time business decisions.

Aimon focuses on artificial intelligence, specifically in the domain of generative AI applications. The company offers a hallucination detection solution that aids in improving the accuracy of generative AI models and provides products that mitigate various generative AI risks such as hallucinations, sensitive data leakage, toxic content, and prompt injections. Aimon primarily serves the artificial intelligence industry. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

Usage Panda is a company that focuses on providing security and observability for OpenAI, operating within the technology and artificial intelligence sectors. The company offers a platform that inspects each request for adherence to a defined policy before it is sent to OpenAI, and collects observability metrics such as latency and error rate for application monitoring purposes. It also provides features for cost management, policy enforcement, user tracking, and real-time data logging. It is based in New York

Diveplane develops technology that helps to understand AI with a trainable, interpretable, and auditable. It offers products such as Diveplane REACTOR, Diveplane GEMINAI, Diveplane ALLUVION, and Diveplane SONAR, and offers a solution Diveplane professional services to finance, healthcare, supply chain, commercial real estate, and defense industries. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Raleigh, North Carolina.

Gantry operates a service that aims to help AI development teams decide when to retrain their AI systems and which data to use during retraining. Its platform can connect to existing apps, data labeling services, and data storage and can summarize and visualize data during the training, evaluation, and deployment stages. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

LatticeFlow helps companies' ML teams to deliver AI models by auto-diagnosing and improving data and models. It caters its services to the smart city, medical, manufacturing, and mobility sectors. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

Evidently AI builds an open-source standard to evaluate and monitor machine-learning models in production. It is designed to help enterprise data science teams operate their models more reliably and detect and resolve issues.

Fiddler AI is building an explainable AI engine that will allow companies to analyze, manage, and deploy their machine learning models at scale. It serves businesses ranging from large enterprises to startups.

Distributional is a company that focuses on artificial intelligence (AI) testing within the technology sector. The company offers a platform for AI testing and evaluation, aiming to make AI systems safe, robust, and reliable. It primarily serves the enterprise sector. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Braintrust Data focuses on providing an enterprise-grade stack for building AI products, operating in the artificial intelligence industry. The company offers services such as AI evaluations, data management, and a platform for comparing and testing AI models. Their services are primarily used by businesses looking to incorporate AI into their operations. It was founded in 2023 and is based in California, San Francisco.
WhyLabs is an AI observability platform for model monitoring and data monitoring that scales to support massive data. Built for practitioners, by practitioners.

Patronus AI provides an automated evaluation and security platform that helps companies use large language models (LLMs) safely. It enables enterprise development teams to score model performance, generate adversarial test cases, and benchmark models. Patronus AI was founded in 2023 and is based in Dublin, California.

Cranium develops an artificial intelligence security and trust platform. It offers cyber security services for commercial and individual customers. It provides security test scores, model security scores, AI pipeline mapping and visualization, and more. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Short Hills, New Jersey.

Aporia helps artificial intelligence and machine learning teams with model productization. The company provides a monitoring platform for machine learning to address concept drift, data integrity issues, and retraining insights.
Build Python LLM apps in minutes

NannyML develops an AI-monitoring platform designed to detect data drift, concept drift and estimate possible model degradation. The company's system measures the performance of the AI models in production, automatically lets the user know when their AI models are failing and offering a deep and intuitive understanding of how the AI models make decisions and those change over time, enabling decision-makers to monitor the decisions that AI takes and make their business decisions accordingly.

Mithril Security integrates artificial intelligence (AI) into applications for security and privacy purpose. The company's platform provides an open-source solution for one-click secure deployment of artificial intelligence models on confidential computing, enabling clients to deploy and sell new products leveraging sensitive data, and leveraging public cloud solutions for regulated data to reduce their operating costs. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Ris-Orangis, France.

TruEra helps companies to build and maintain better ML models, faster. TruEra provides a suite of AI quality solutions that help enterprises analyze machine learning, improve and monitor model quality, and build trust. Powered by Artificial Intelligence (AI) Explainability technology, the TruEra platform helps eliminate the black box surrounding widely used AI and ML technologies. This visibility leads to higher quality, explainable models that sustainably achieve measurable business results, address unfair bias, and ensure governance and compliance. TruEra serves companies in industries including aerospace and defense, banking, government, healthcare, insurance, and manufacturing. The company was formerly known as AILens. TruEra was founded in 2019 and is based in Redwood City, California

Klu provides a generative AI platform for SaaS applications. It aims to simplify the design, deployment, and optimization of AI-enabled applications. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

Arize AI develops an analytical platform for observability in artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning to watch, troubleshoot and guardrail deployed AI enables clients to accelerate detecting and resolving issues. Its solutions provide ML teams the tools to understand their models in production and to get the cause behind issues that emerge. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Mill Valley, California.
HoneyHive offers an AI-based optimization platform for large language-model apps. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

Arthur offers an AI model monitoring platform. It works with enterprise teams to monitor, measure, and improve machine learning models for better results across accuracy, explainability, and fairness. The firm was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

Neptune is a platform built for data scientists to make machine learning models development fast and reliable. With Neptune data scientists can easily monitor, compare, track and reproduce their experiments and results. Neptune was founded in 2017 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

Martian focuses on artificial intelligence's (AI) safety and efficiency. It offers solutions that allow for the inspection of AI models, aiming to make them safer, more effective, and less costly. The company primarily serves the artificial intelligence industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Adaptive ML specializes in generative artificial intelligence technology within the AI industry. The company offers a platform for testing, serving, monitoring, and iterating on large language models, designed for user interactions and specific use cases. Its solutions cater to businesses looking to integrate state-of-the-art AI into their products without requiring reinforcement learning knowledge. It was founded in 2023 and is based in New York, New York.

Fireworks AI specializes in providing a generative AI platform for product innovation within the technology sector. The company offers a range of curated and in-house trained generative AI models, including large language models and multi-modal models, optimized for various applications such as dialogue, instruction following, and function calling. Fireworks AI primarily serves developers and enterprises, offering AI solutions with enterprise-scale throughput and compliance with industry standards like HIPAA and SOC2.... See More
Neural Magic develops an inference engine that data scientists can run on computers running CPUs, rather than specialized chips like GPUs or TPUs.

BentoML specializes in developing and scaling artificial intelligence(AI) applications. The company offers a unified AI application framework that allows software engineers to build AI products using pre-trained models, manage and version these models, and ship them to production quickly and efficiently. It primarily serves the artificial intelligence and software development sectors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Humanloop operates as a platform for large language models (LLMs). It provides a data labeling and model training platform. It uses research in machine learning and natural language processing to make it easy for companies to integrate artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms that understand language. Its technology draws computer science to automate the labeling of data, build models from smaller data sets and continuously update those models. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Cambridge, United Kingdom.

Voyage AI develops embedding models for artificial intelligence applications within various business sectors. The company offers production-ready models that enhance the precision and efficiency of chatbots and AI systems by improving data vectorization and retrieval quality. Voyage AI's services are tailored to industries such as engineering, finance, legal, and healthcare, providing domain-specific solutions. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

Predibases mission is to make ML easy for every organization. Like Infrastructure-as-Code simplified IT, Predibases ML platform allows users to focus on the what of their ML models rather than the how, breaking free of the usual limitations in low-code systems and bringing down the time-to-value of ML projects from years to days. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

LangChain specializes in the development of large language model (LLM) applications, providing a suite of products that support developers throughout the application lifecycle. It offers a framework for building context-aware, reasoning applications, tools for debugging, testing, and monitoring app performance, and solutions for deploying APIs with ease. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Lightning AI operates as a machine learning (ML) application-building platform. It allows researchers, data scientists, and software engineers to build and share scalable, production-ready artificial intelligence (AI) applications using the tools and technologies. Lightning AI was formerly known as Grid. AI. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

AirOps offers a data analytics platform to help operators turn data into transformative business outcomes. The company offers interactive enterprise data analytics and data discovery. AirOps was founded in 2021 and is based in Sacramento, California.

Fixie.ai offers a platform as a service that makes it easy for developers to build LLM-based apps that work with the broader architecture. It offers an automated cloud-based platform for building, hosting, and scaling natural language agents, integrating with arbitrary tools, data sources, and APIs to automate business processes. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

Lamini provides an artificial intelligence (AI)-powered large language model (LLM) engine for developers to rapidly and easily train custom models. This tool utilizes generative AI and machine learning to streamline software development processes and increase productivity. It is a user-friendly tool that enables software engineers to rapidly ship new versions with an API call without worrying about hosting or running out of compute. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Stanford, California.
OctoML offers efficient and secure deployments of machine learning and deep learning models as a managed service.
Substrate Lab is an application programming interface (API) for machine learning. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

Inngest provides a workflow engine for serverless workflow development across various business sectors. The company offers a platform that enables teams to develop and run serverless workflows, background jobs, and scheduled tasks. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

LastMile AI provides a software development platform. It designs to help software engineers develop and integrate generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) models into their apps. LastMile AI was founded in 2023 and is based in New York, New York.

LlamaIndex offers a data framework for connecting custom data sources to large language models (LLMs). Its data framework connects custom data sources to large language models that connect unstructured, structured, and semi-structured data sources, assisting businesses to build end-user applications. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Arcee specializes in the development of small language models (SLMs) within the artificial intelligence sector. The company offers an SLM adaptation system that enables the training, deployment, and continuous improvement of language models securely within a client's own virtual private cloud (VPC) environment. Arcee's system is designed to cater to various sectors, including legal, healthcare, finance, and insurance. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Miami, Florida.

Prompt Security focuses on security, privacy, and safety in the generative artificial intelligence (GAI) domain. The company's main service is to provide security solutions that protect organizations from the risks associated with generative AI. It was founded in 2023 and is based in New York, New York.

anch.AI is an Ethical AI Governance platform operating in the technology sector. The company provides a platform that assists businesses in managing and deploying AI solutions in a manner that complies with EU regulations, thereby mitigating legal and ethical risks. The platform is primarily used by data-driven organizations across various industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

HiddenLayer is a network security company that provides security solutions. It develops and provides a machine-learning-based threat detection and response platform. It also offers consulting, threat modeling, ML risk assessment, and training. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Leander, Texas.

Saidot offers a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) governance platform for enterprises and governments to use AI safely. The company offers a platform that translates AI principles and helps organizations adopt systematic AI governance methodologies in alignment and regulatory requirements. Saidot was founded in 2018 and is based in Espoo, Finland.

Trustible is an AI governance management platform that integrates with existing AI/ML platforms and helps organizations define necessary AI policies, implement and enforce AI practices, and generate evidence to prove compliance with AI regulatory frameworks and be prepared for AI audits. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in Arlington, Virginia.

Konfer provides a self-service product that offers a view of an enterprise's inventory, helping increase collaboration among stakeholders and compliance with existing and upcoming regulations. It primarily serves the enterprise sector, with a particular focus on legal and compliance teams. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Milpitas, California.

Calypso AI develops AI security software to measure, understand, and improve AI systems. It focuses on securing enterprises that use AI and machine language, helping to defend against adversarial machine learning attacks. Calypso AI was founded in 2018 and is based in San Mateo, California.

Aim specializes in enterprise-grade security for generative artificial intelligence (GenAI) technologies across various domains. The company offers a security platform that manages risks, enforces data protection policies, and ensures compliance with privacy and AI regulations for public and internal GenAI applications. Its solutions are designed to protect against data leakage, intellectual property infringement, and other security threats associated with GenAI usage. Aim was formerly known as Haka Security. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

Credo AI provides an artificial intelligence (AI) based security platform. The company helps organizations shape AI development into a workflow assessment that evaluates the data, the decisions, and the deployment of AI models while creating an audit trail that is a complete record of the development process and its intention. Credo AI was founded in 2020 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

Lumenova empowers organizations worldwide to make AI ethical, transparent, and compliant with new and emerging regulations, as well as internal policies. As an end-to-end solution, Lumenova AI streamlines and automates the complete Responsible AI lifecycle, so enterprises can efficiently map, manage, and mitigate AI risk and compliance. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

Holistic AI operates as a software solution for artificial intelligence risk management and auditing. It offers the bias audit mandate and artificial intelligence risk management solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

Preamble operates as artificial intelligence (AI)-safety-as-a-service company. It democratizes a security layer for generative AI systems and offers a platform that allows organizations, domain experts, and stakeholders to curate shared values and deploy generative AI that integrates ethics, maintains security, complies with policies, and mitigates risk. Preamble was founded in 2020 and is based in La Habra, California.

Reality Defender focuses on deepfake detection and offers a proactive detection platform that scans user-generated media for fabricated items, verifies voiceprints, detects doctored documents, and provides alerts for deepfake threats. The company primarily serves enterprises, platforms, and governments. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

Kindo provides an artificial intelligence (Al) platform that connects openAI chatGPT, google bard, Cohere, or any of the other AIs to all of a company's data. By integrating AI into their workflows, it helps companies improve productivity while ensuring security, compliance, and centralized governance. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

QuantPi specializes in providing an artificial intelligence trust platform for the technology sector. The company offers a suite of tools designed to test, govern, and ensure the trustworthiness of artificial intelligence systems, facilitating compliance with regulations and performance standards. QuantPi's products serve the technology industry, particularly in areas related to artificial intelligence system validation, risk management, and ethical compliance. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Saarbrucken, Germany.

Enzai provides a lifecycle management tool that allows users to document and govern artificial intelligence systems for clients are businesses. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Belfast, United Kingdom.

Monitaur specializes in AI governance software, focusing on ethical and responsible AI management across various industries. The company offers a comprehensive platform that guides and governs the entire lifecycle of AI, providing solutions for risk management, documentation, monitoring, and auditing of AI systems. Monitaur primarily serves sectors that require robust AI governance, such as financial services, healthcare, and technology. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Duxbury, Massachusetts.

Protect AI develops cybersecurity solutions focused on the security of artificial intelligence and machine learning systems. It specializes in MLSecOps, cybersecurity and develops tools to harden the security around AI systems. Its tool, AI Radar, delivers visibility into the various components used to build an AI model including the data used for training, testing datasets and code. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

Fairly AI develops cloud-based technology designed to provide quality assurance for automated decision-making systems. It is an API-driven toolkit for AI governance and risk management platform. It enables data science and policy teams to connect and collaborate, bridging the AI oversight gap by making it easy to apply policies and controls throughout the model lifecycle. Fairly AI was founded in 2020 and is based in Kitchener, Canada.

Guardrails AI empowers humanity to harness the unprecedented capabilities of foundational AI models. Its aim is to unlock an unparalleled scale of potential, ensuring the reliable, safe, and beneficial application of AI technology to improve human life. It eliminates the uncertainties inherent in AI interactions, providing goal-oriented, contractually bound solutions. Guardrails AI was founded in 2023 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

Calvin Risk offers a platform for artificial intelligence (AI) governance, risk management, and compliance. The company targets users of artificial intelligence including insurance, pharmaceuticals, and technology, using its risk management system. It offers qualitative solutions to assess and manage the risks of AI algorithms in commercial use. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Kloten, Switzerland.

P0 specializes in automated security testing within the software development industry. The company offers a tool that performs static application security testing on code to identify a variety of security vulnerabilities. Its services are primarily utilized by the software development and cybersecurity sectors. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

Robust Intelligence builds products that integrate seamlessly into the AI development life cycle to ensure robustness and reliability. Its customers include technology companies, financial institutions, and government agencies.

Credal AI focuses on data security in the artificial intelligence industry. The company offers services that protect sensitive data across all AI applications, ensuring that business secrets or protected data are not compromised. Its main offerings include secure chat, security questionnaires, API gateway, and AI security guides. Credal AI primarily serves sectors that heavily rely on AI applications and data security. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Brooklyn, New York

Giskard offers a collaborative and open-source software platform to ensure the quality of AI models. Its continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) platform help in the integration, uploading, evaluation, testing, and deployment of machine learning (ML) models. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Paris, France.

Apheris offers a collaborative data ecosystem platform. It enables multiple organizations to extract value from each other's decentralized data sets by allowing data providers and data consumers to collaborate in a technically and commercially viable way. It builds data solutions and unlocks new insights from distributed data of multiple parties without compromising on security and ownership. The company serves industries such as healthcare, pharma, and manufacturing. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

Synativ helps users to generate data through computer vision models. It allows engineers to generate images, videos, and text data to improve dataset imbalances, domain adaptation, and edge case issues. Synativ was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

Prophesee develops neuromorphic vision systems. Its vision sensors and systems mimic how the human eye and brain work to improve efficiency in areas such as autonomous vehicles, industrial automation, IoT, security and surveillance, and AR/VR. The company offers products such as METAVISION packaged sensor, METAVISION intelligence suite, and IMAGO visioncam. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Paris, France.
Clearview AI offers a facial recognition tool that uses photos scraped from different social media and websites.

Rerun develops a visual introspection tool for teams building perception-heavy products. It helps developers to build systems that perceive the physical world by helping them understand and communicate around their systems and data. It allows the users to build products that depend on understanding the physical world through sensors, using technologies like computer vision, machine learning, and sensor fusion. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden

Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) designs, develops and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services. It focuses on technology and operates in the consumer electronics and software industry. The company offers a range of products including personal computing devices, mobile communication devices, portable music players, and related software, services, and accessories. Apple primarily sells to the consumer electronics industry. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Cupertino, California.

Chooch is a software development company providing an artificial intelligence vision platform. The platform detects images, pictures, and patterns of images and takes action accordingly and has various applications such as workplace safety, satellite image analysis, procedure detection in operating rooms, and image quality control. It serves the manufacturing, safety and security, retail, healthcare, and oil and gas industries. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Mateo, California.

Encord enables businesses to utilize artificial intelligence (AI) by automating the time-consuming process of making unstructured data machine-readable. Its software offers a collaborative solution with automation capabilities for annotating, managing, and evaluating data for machine learning projects. It serves healthcare, aerospace and defense, computer vision, and other sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

Clarifai is an artificial intelligence company that excels in visual recognition, solving real-world problems for businesses and developers alike. Clarifai's image and video recognition technology is built on the most advanced machine learning systems and made easily accessible by a clean API, empowering developers all over the world to build a new generation of intelligent applications.

Gridspace is a conversational intelligence company that develops software to make complex interactions easy to understand by making them searchable, accessible, and organized. The company's mission is to clarify and elevate business communication. Gridspace was founded as a collaboration between SRI Speech Labs, the lab behind Siri, and a multidisciplinary team of engineers.

Speechmatics develops Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) technology that enables businesses to accurately understand and transcribe human-level speech into text regardless of demographic, age, gender, accent, dialect, or location. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Cambridge, U.K.

Eleven Labs offers a platform for generating long-format speech in any voice and in any language. The company engages in the research and development of novel methods in voice artificial intelligence (AI) to make content in any language and voice. Eleven Labs was founded in 2022 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

Gladia develops a range of application programming interfaces. It develops audio-intelligent APIs, computer vision and image intelligence APIs, automated machine learning, natural language processing, and text intelligence APIs. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Paris, France.

Avoma is an AI-powered meeting assistant for remote team communications. Its target is B2B companies and their sales and client success teams. Avoma offers several products and capabilities, including an AI meeting assistant that records, transcribes, and analyzes meetings and gets summarized notes. Avoma's conversation intelligence aims to learn topic trends, a teams winning talk patterns, and deal insights. It also enables deal collaboration so a team can share and curate customer feedback, comment, and provide coaching.

Deepgram is a speech recognition platform that leverages conversational intelligence with transcription and context for speech understanding. It automates transcribing pre-recorded audio and video into text with AI and Natural Language Understanding (NLU) for voice intelligence for summarization, sentiment analysis, language detection, and more. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

AssemblyAI is an applied artificial intelligence company that develops an API for speech recognition. Its platform allows users to automatically convert audio and video files and live audio streams to text with AssemblyAI's Speech-to-Text APIs. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Otter.ai is a provider of an AI-powered live transcription application. Its software generates searchable, sharable notes from the spoken content of meetings, lectures, and presentations held in English. It can automatically record sentences according to the context of a speech, even over long multi-party conversations and transcribes text in real-time. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Los Altos, California.

PolyAI is a software development company that develops a machine learning platform for conversational artificial intelligence. It specializes in machine learning, digital transformation, voice assistants, customer experience, and more. It primarily serves in the fields of banking, hospitality, insurance, retail, and telecommunications. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in London, U.K.

SoundHound (NASDAQ: SOUN) provides voice-enabled artificial intelligence and conversational intelligence technologies. Its products include Hound, which leverages speech-to-meaning and deep-meaning understanding technologies to enhance the smartphone experience, and Houndify, which enables developers and business owners to deploy anywhere and provides speech recognition, and natural language understanding. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

Cogito aims to enhance the emotional intelligence of phone workers through behavioral change software. It applies behavioral science through artificial intelligence and machine learning providing in-call guidance helping enterprises improve sales results, and deliver better customer experiences. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

Verbit uses artificial and human intelligence to provide a smart transcription and captioning solution. The company's technology generates speech-to-text files to provide over 99% accuracy. Verbits customized solution helps organizations maximize the potential of their audio and video files by making information searchable, accessible, and actionable.

Sembly AI is a company that focuses on artificial intelligence in the business services sector. The company offers a platform that transcribes and analyzes meetings, generating actionable insights and meeting summaries. It primarily serves the business sector, with a particular focus on enhancing productivity in meetings. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) is a multinational technology company that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services. Its hardware products include the iPhone smartphone, the iPad tablet computer, the Mac personal computer, the iPod portable media player, the Apple Watch smartwatch, and the Apple TV digital media player. Apple's consumer software includes the macOS and iOS operating systems, the iTunes media player, the Safari web browser, and the iLife and iWork creativity and productivity suites. Its online services include the iTunes Store, the iOS App Store and Mac App Store, Apple Music, and iCloud.

Nuance Communications (Nasdaq: NUAN) develops, markets, and supports a voice interface software platform that makes the information and services of enterprises, telecommunications networks, and the Internet accessible from any telephone. On March 4th, 2022, Nuance Communications was acquired by Microsoft at a valuation of $19.7B.

Symbl.ai is a conversational intelligence application programming interface (API) platform. It offers sales intelligence, customer service intelligence, human resource intelligence, meeting intelligence, communications intelligence, and more for enterprises. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

Lilt provides interactive and adaptive machine-assisted translation tools. Translators can translate documents via a web-based CAT tool. Localization providers can integrate Lilt into their existing systems via a web API. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Portola Valley, California.

Hume AI focuses on artificial intelligence (AI), specifically in the domain of emotional understanding and human well-being. The company offers a toolkit that uses AI to understand and measure human emotional expression in various forms such as images, videos, audio, and text, aiming to align technology with human well-being. Hume AI primarily serves sectors such as voice assistants, health tech, and social networks. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

Argilla is an open-source platform for data-centric Natural Language Processing (NLP). It builds NLP products through data labeling and curation. The company empowers teams with programmatic labeling features. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

Unbabel enables modern enterprises to serve customers in their native languages, with always-on, scalable translation across digital channels. Powered by AI and refined by a global community of translators, Unbabel combines the speed and scale of machine translation with the authenticity from a native speaker.

Amenity Analytics develops cloud-based text analytics solutions using natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning. It automates the process of sifting through complex documents and narrative content to find and visualize data sets. The company enables businesses to create exact data models from complicated text sources without any coding. Amenity Analytics was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York. In November 2022, Amenity Analytics was acquired by Symphony. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Primer is a machine intelligence company building machines that can read and write, automating the analysis of large datasets. Primer's technology is deployed by government agencies, financial institutions, and Fortune 500 companies.
Explosion is a software company specializing in developer tools for AI and Natural Language Processing. Its products include Prodigy, Thinc, and SpaCy.

Hugging Face offers an open-source library where users can build, train, and deploy models powered by the reference open-source in natural language processing. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

Emotibot focuses on artificial intelligence technology and forms natural language technology (NLT) as the core for wider enterprise applications. The company's products include Bot Factory conversational AI platform, Gemini knowledge engineering platform, AICC+ solution platform, NLP natural language processing platform, Scorpio automated machine learning platform, and so on. The company's products serve in AI+finance, AI+enterprise, AI+healthcare, AI+manufacturing, AI+intelligent terminal, AI+government, and other fields. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Shanghai, China.

Smartling's content solution helps brands gain a more competitive global position by transforming the way content is created and consumed around the world. Smartling's technology, the Global Fluency Platform, helps brands access new markets, more customers, and greater value.

Cohere's mission is to build machines that understand the world and make them safely accessible to all by breaking the language barrier. The Cohere API provides access to models that read hundreds of millions of web pages and learn to understand the meaning, sentiment, and intent of the words people use.

deepset aims to bridge the gap between NLP research and the industry. With its open-source software, it enables developers to use the latest language models and transfer learning techniques for their individual tasks. Its additional features and services help enterprises to build, run, and maintain production-ready NLP applications. deepset was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

Rasa Technologies is a provider of open-source machine learning tools for developers and product teams to expand chatbots beyond answering simple questions. Rasa's machine learning-based dialogue tools allow developers to automate contextual conversations.

DeepL is a company that specializes in neural machine translation. The company offers a range of services including text translation in over 30 languages, document translation for various file formats, and an AI-powered writing tool that helps improve grammar, punctuation, and tone of voice. Its primary customers are individuals and businesses that require translation services. DeepL was formerly known as Linguee. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cologne, Germany.

Language I/O provides software that allows for multilingual customer support in multiple languages. The AI technology enables LIO to quickly generate accurate, company-specific translations of all user-generated content (UGC) including jargon, slang, abbreviations, and misspellings into over 100 languages via chat, email, article, and social support channels. LIO is accessible directly via API and integrates with CRMs, including Salesforce, Oracle, and Zendesk. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Cheyenne, Wyoming

YITU Technology works in the Artificial Intelligent (AI) fields such as computer vision, speech recognition, natural language processing, intelligent decision-making and AI chips. Leveraging AI technology, YITU is empowering diverse industries. It provides advanced technologies and products in several sectors including intelligent city, smart finance, intelligent healthcare, smart retail, AI chips and AI pharmaceuticals.

Contextual AI provides a customizable, privacy-aware artificial intelligence (AI) for the workplace. It connects enterprise data to its proprietary AI models to provide customizable and up-to-date solutions. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Meta operates as a technology company focusing on building platforms and tools to facilitate social connections and business. The company includes social networking applications and immersive technologies such as augmented and virtual reality. It primarily serves the social technology industry. Meta was formerly known as Facebook. It was founded in 2004 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

Extropic is an AI computing power chip that develops an optimized chip designed to run large language models and creates a new computational paradigm. Its paradigm leverages the power of non-equilibrium thermodynamics to fundamentally fuse generative artificial intelligence with world physics. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Austin, Texas.

xAI focuses on artificial intelligence, specifically in the domain of language learning models. The company's main product, Grok, is designed to answer a wide range of questions and suggest potential inquiries, functioning as a research assistant that helps users find information online. xAI primarily caters to the AI research community and the general public seeking AI tools for information retrieval and understanding. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Burlingame, California.

Anthropic is an AI safety and research company that specializes in developing advanced AI systems. The company's main offerings include AI research and products that prioritize safety, with a focus on creating conversational AI assistants for enterprise use. Anthropic primarily serves sectors that require reliable and interpretable AI technology. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Conjecture focuses on applied, scalable AI alignment research in the technology sector. The company's main service involves building a new AI architecture aimed at ensuring the controllable, safe development of advanced AI technology. The company primarily serves the artificial intelligence industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

Microsoft Research, a subsidiary of Microsoft, is focused on research methods to advance computing and solve technological innovation in collaboration with academic, government, and industry researchers.

Inflection operates as an artificial intelligence (AI) studio focused on the technology sector. The company's main offering is a personal AI, designed to provide supportive and empathetic conversation, assist with planning and brainstorming, and offer explanations for complex ideas in a clear and straightforward manner. It primarily serves the general public, aiming to enhance well-being and happiness through digital experiences. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

AI21 Labs operates as an artificial intelligence (AI) lab and product company. The company offers a range of AI-powered tools, including a writing companion tool to assist users in rephrasing their writing, and an AI reader that summarizes long documents. It also provides language models for developers to create AI-powered applications. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.
Keen AGI is a technology company. It offers technology-based products and services. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Dallas, Texas.

Adept is a machine learning research and product lab that focuses on developing general intelligence within the technology sector. The lab specializes in creating AI models that understand and execute tasks on a computer based on natural language commands. Adept's technology is designed to facilitate collaboration between humans and computers, enhancing productivity and enabling more informed decisions. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Imbue is an independent research company that develops general-purpose artificial intelligence (AI) agents and conducts research on self-supervised learning for simulated worlds and computer vision problems. It was formerly known as Generally Intelligent. Imbue was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Sema4.ai focuses on advancing knowledge work through the development of AI Application platforms within the artificial intelligence sector. The company specializes in creating intelligent agents that facilitate and transform the collaboration between knowledge workers and AI technologies. These platforms are designed to enhance the productivity and capabilities of professionals across various sectors who rely on knowledge-intensive tasks. It was founded in 2024 and is based in Buckhead, Georgia.

Numenta develops core technology in machine intelligence based on a theory of the neocortex. Numenta's first product based on this technology is a cloud-based prediction engine for streaming data. Grok is a cloud-based service that finds complex patterns in data streams and generates actionable predictions in real time.

Krutrim is an AI company that develops a large language model and conversational AI technology. The company offers a voice-enabled conversational AI assistant that can understand and speak multiple Indian languages. It also develops AI-optimized chips. Krutrim primarily serves developers and enterprises with its AI solutions and APIs. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

Mistral AI focuses on the development of open-source artificial intelligence models in the technology sector. The company's main offerings include efficient, adaptable AI models that allow for full customization by users without requiring their data. Its models are primarily used in the tech industry. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Paris, France.

Reka AI is a research and development company. It offers services in AI research at DeepMind, FAIR, and Google Brain. Its product, RekaLM, offers to read text, images, and tabular data and generate, distill, or deploy on-premise with a few simple commands. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

4Paradigm is a provider of artificial intelligence technology and services, helping financial firms to detect fraud, improve efficiency, reduce risk, and market to customers more effectively based on online habits.

01.AI focuses on the development of AI 2.0 platforms and applications in the artificial intelligence industry. The company's main offerings include the creation of a new AI 2.0 platform. It develops an open-source, foundational large language model, Yi-34B, which is available to developers around the world in Chinese and English. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Beijing, China.

Liquid AI focuses on the development of general-purpose artificial intelligence systems operating within the technology and AI industries. The company's main offerings include AI systems that can process multimodal data such as language, signals, and vision and are designed to reason, plan, and communicate their decision-making process in a manner aligned with human values. These systems are primarily targeted at sectors that require efficient and adaptable AI solutions. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Brookline, Massachusetts

Normal Computing is a technology company that builds artificial intelligence (AI). It develops technology for basic support and aims to build a full-stack infrastructure by integrating machine-learning frameworks and solving problems in enterprise and government applications. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

Google Research is focused on advancing science and AI within the technology sector. The company publishes research papers across a wide range of domains, sharing its latest developments to collaboratively progress computing and science. Google Research's work impacts various sectors, including health, sustainability, and information accessibility. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

LightOn provides foundation models for augmented work and creativity by leveraging exascale hardware and deep learning insights. The company develops Large Language Models (VLM-4) and makes natural language processing (NLP) models available to all through the Muse application programming interface (API). It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

OpenAI is a company focused on artificial intelligence (AI) research and deployment. The company offers a platform that provides access to its latest AI models and guides for safety best practices. They primarily serve the technology industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Aleph Alpha is an AI research and application company. It researches, develops, and operationalizes large-scale AI models for language, image data, and strategy and contributes to securing digital sovereignty. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Heidelberg, Germany.

AI Foundation aims to democratize and decentralize artificial intelligence. Its first product called Reality Defender, combines human moderation and machine learning to identify malicious content meant to deceive people such as deepfakes.

MIT CSAIL focuses on developing fundamentally new technologies, conducting basic research that furthers the field of computing, and inspiring and educating future generations of scientists and technologists. It was founded in 2004 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

Allen Institute for Artificial Intelligence (AI2) with the singular focus of conducting high-impact research and engineering in the field of artificial intelligence for the common good. AI2 is the creation of Paul Allen, Microsoft co-founder, and is led by Dr. Oren Etzioni, a world-renowned researcher and professor in the field of AI and computer science. In response to the COVID-19 pandemic, the Allen Institute for AI has partnered with leading research groups to prepare and distribute the COVID-19 Open Research Dataset (CORD-19), a free resource of over 44,000 scholarly articles, including over 29,000 with full text, about COVID-19 and the coronavirus family of viruses for use by the global research community.
The German Research Center for Artificial Intelligence (DFKI) is a German research institute in the field of software technology.

EleutherAI is a nonprofit research lab focused on the interpretability, alignment, and ethics of artificial intelligence. It provides access to AI technologies by training and releasing models and promoting open science norms in Natural Language Processing. The lab was founded in 2020 and is based in Washington, District of Columbia.
Vector Institute is a Canada-based, technology research company, specializing in the field of artificial intelligence, machine learning, and deep learning.

Austrian Research Institute for Artificial Intelligence (OFAI) focuses on advancing the field of artificial intelligence (AI) through research and development. The institute conducts various AI related projects, offers resources, and publishes findings to contribute to the broader scientific community. It primarily serves the academic and research sectors within the artificial intelligence domain. It was founded in 1984 and is based in Vienna, Austria.
Montreal Institute for Learning Algorithms (Mila) is a research institute that specializes in areas of language modelling, machine translation, object recognition and generative models.

Machine Intelligence Research Institute (MIRI) is a nonprofit organization. It focuses on artificial intelligence within the technology sector. The company's main service is conducting foundational mathematical research to develop safe artificial intelligence and ensure that smarter-than-human AI has a positive impact. The primary sectors the company caters to include the technology and artificial intelligence industries. Machine Intelligence Research Institute was founded in 2000 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Kyutai focuses on the development of artificial general intelligence within the open science framework. The company's main offerings include research and development in the field of artificial intelligence (AI), democratizing access to advanced intelligence systems. Kyutai primarily serves sectors that benefit from AI technology and open science principles. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Paris, France.

Arm designs the technology for advanced digital products, from wireless, networking, and consumer entertainment solutions to imaging, automotive, security, and storage devices. Its product offering includes RISC microprocessors, graphics processors, video engines, enabling software, cell libraries, embedded memories, high-speed connectivity products, peripherals, and development tools. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Cambridge, U.K. In June 2018, Telco System acquired a majority stake in Arm.

Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) (NASDAQ: AMD) is a multinational semiconductor company. It offers a range of products such as central processing units (CPUs), graphics processing units (GPUs), field-programmable gate arrays (FPGAs), and more. It serves industries such as education, healthcare, media, and more. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

Berkshire Grey (NASDAQ: BGRY) develops solutions that combine AI and robotics to automate omni-channel fulfillment. The company's solutions transform pick, pack, and sort operations to deliver competitive advantage for retailers, eCommerce, and logistics enterprises serving todays connected consumers. Berkshire Grey was founded in 2013 and is based in Bedford, Massachusetts.

Etched offers AI computing hardware specialized for transformers, designed to radically cut LLM inference costs. The company offers hard-coding chips for the transformer architecture, allowing for the computation of language models compared to general-purpose GPUs, enabling developers to build the future of generative AI. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

TensTorrent develops a high-performance processor ASICs, specifically engineered for deep learning and smart hardware. The company's processor is designed to excel at both learning and inference, while being software-programmable to support the future in the field of machine learning. The processor's architecture easily scales from battery-powered IoT devices to large cloud servers, and surpasses today's solutions by several orders of magnitude in raw performance and energy efficiency.
Speedata is developing a specialized computer processor for data analytics workloads. Its aim is to design a processor that expedites cloud-based database and analytic workloads.

CORNAMI is a computing company that delivers a technology that efficiently exploits all forms of parallelism, including SIMD, MIMD, Dataflow. Pipelining, Neural Networks, Systolic Arrays, Cellular automata, etc. Cornami was founded in 2011 and is based in Campbell, California.

Rebellions develop artificial intelligence semiconductor-based solutions. The company builds artificial intelligence accelerators bridging the gap between underlying silicon architectures and deep learning algorithms. Its service is in the electronics industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

Horizon Robotics is a provider of energy-efficient computing solutions for advanced driver assistance systems and autonomous driving for smart vehicles, with the mission to make human life safer and better. It integrates algorithms, processor design, software, and hardware capabilities. It envisions every device becoming an intelligent entity, providing solutions for processor design, high-performance cloud computing, parallel computing, face recognition, and voice semantic recognition. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Beijing, China.

Celestial AI is a machine learning (ML) accelerator company that develops technology platforms.
