The company's main service involves the use of AI agents to streamline and enhance regulatory compliance processes. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

Drata offers a security and compliance automation platform that aims to help companies earn and keep the trust of their users, customers, partners, and prospects. The platform helps companies streamline their SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, GDPR, and PCI DSS compliance through continuous automated control monitoring and evidence collection. The platform is designed for businesses of any size. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in San Diego, California.

Hadrius offers a platform for automating the Securities and Exchange Commission's (SEC) ongoing compliance process. It provides compliance programs on auto-pilot. It provides compliance models by using artificial intelligence thereby increasing accuracy and saving time. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, California.

Metronome delivers an online platform for usage-based billing. It helps software companies launch, iterate, and scale their usage-based business models, with billing infrastructure that works at any size and stage. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Causal offers cloud-based spreadsheet software to build models, connect to data, and share dashboards with teams. It integrates with Stripe, QuickBooks, Salesforce, and others and allows charts and reports to be generated programmatically. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Claymont, Delaware.
Digits leverages APIs, classification algorithms, and machine learning techniques to provide a real-time view into a businesss finances.

Arteria AI focuses on the development of artificial intelligence solutions in the legal and contract management industry. The company offers data-centric end-to-end Contract Lifecycle Management solutions. Arteria AI serves the legal tech industry and the financial sector. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

DataRails is a provider of a solution that aims to bring sophisticated big business FP&A tools to SME CFOs. It aims to allow SMEs to adopt a cloud-based solution while using the familiar Excel and their existing models. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
Arkifi is an artificial-intelligence company. It develops workflow automation tools for advanced finance. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in Palo, Alto, California.

Planful provides cloud-based enterprise performance management SaaS. The software helps with budgeting, planning, forecasting, modeling, analytics, and consolidation of financial details in addition to serving as an analytics platform for its business functions like human resources, sales, and marketing. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Redwood City, California.

Anrok provides global sales tax solutions for software-as-a-service (SaaS) businesses. The company automates sales tax compliance across the financial stack. It offers automated sales tax monitoring, tax calculation, and tax filing solutions for users' businesses. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Zuora ZUO (NYSE) offers a subscription relationship management platform to help businesses in any industry to launch or shift products for subscription, implement new pay-as-you-go pricing and packaging models, gain new insights into subscriber behavior, open new revenue streams, and disrupt market segments to gain a competitive advantage. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in San Mateo, California.

AppZen develops finance AI software built to deliver autonomous processing for finance teams. The AI software uses deep learning, semantic analysis, and computer vision to process intelligence from thousands of data sources, documents, and images so that organizations can better understand financial transactions and make improved business decisions. The company serves clients across multi industries globally. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Jose, California.

Pigment offers a reporting SaaS solution to forecast the future of businesses with scenarios through charts, simulations, and continuous modeling. It provides accounting and management services to finance executives, revenue operations, and human resources teams. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

HighRadius is a fintech enterprise SaaS platform that automates accounts receivable and treasury processes with AI-based autonomous systems powered by the Rivana AI Engine and Freeda Digital Assistant. HighRadius Integrated Receivables platform reduces cycle times in order-to-cash process through automation of receivables and payments processes across credit, electronic billing and payment processing, cash application, deductions, and collections. HighRadius Treasury Management helps teams achieve touchless cash management, accurate forecasting, and seamless bank reconciliation.

Vena Solutions turns Excel into an enterprise-class platform to automate financial and other spreadsheet-driven processes across organizations. Customers use Vena for corporate performance management (CPM) applications including budgeting, financial close management, reporting, and automating other spreadsheet driven processes across and beyond finance.

Vic.ai is an artificial intelligence (AI) platform for accounting firms and enterprise finance departments. It develops artificially intelligent accounting software that automates accounting and uses data to offer insightful analysis and advice. It serves professional services, real estate, insurance, education, and hospitality industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

Anaplan is a cloud-based business planning and performance management platform based on a single hub where business users can create and use models. Using its proprietary Hyperblock technology, Anaplan lets users contextualize the live performance and forecast future outcomes. Anaplan enables connected strategy and planning across an enterprise to move a business forward. Anaplan was founded in 2006 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Avalara helps businesses of all sizes achieve compliance with transactional taxes, including sales, value-added tax (VAT), excise, communications, and other tax types of services. It delivers automated, cloud-based solutions including Avalara AvaTax, Avalara Returns, Avalara Cross-Border, Avalara e-Invoicing, and more. It primarily caters to the financial service sector. It was founded in 2004 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

botkeeper provides startups and growing businesses with a robotic bookkeeper that automates bookkeeping and accounting tasks using machine learning (ML), artificial intelligence (AI), and human assistance. Its Transaction Manager uses ML and AI to auto-categorize transactions. Smart Connect links directly to a client's financial accounts and fetches bank statements from financial institutions. Task manager simplifies communication, improves staff oversight, and manages the user's firms outstanding tasks in one secure place. Password Manager offers a secure, centralized, and streamlined view of all the user's client's credentials.

Pilot.com is an online bookkeeping platform. Pilot provides users with an account manager, sends transactions automatically and sends a detail report containing profits, losses, balances, and cash flows by the 15th of each month. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

m3ter focuses on providing usage-based pricing solutions in the software industry. The company offers a Pricing Operations Platform that enables software companies to ingest and enrich usage data, apply pricing, and generate error-free bills in real time. m3ter primarily serves the software industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

Orb develops a pricing platform built for flexible pricing models. It automates billing and enables pricing strategy experimentation. It offers an end-to-end revenue workflow, from collecting and metering product usage data to flexible pricing and packaging iteration. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Lago provides open-source metering and usage-based billing solutions, operating in the fintech and cloud infrastructure sectors. It offers a range of services including usage metering, price plan management, invoicing, and billing integrations, all designed for the billing process of businesses. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Paris, France.

OpenEnvoy provides accounts payable (AP) automation solutions. It specializes to manage high-volume, variable-cost invoices for complex accounts payables. The company offers voice auditing without intervention and reconciliation while eliminating billing errors. OpenEnvoy was founded in 2020 and is based in Las Vegas, California.

Truewind specializes in AI-powered bookkeeping and financial services for the startup sector. The company offers bookkeeping, financial modeling, and accounting services designed to support startups and small businesses in managing their finances efficiently. Truewind primarily serves fast-growing startups, providing them with accurate financial reporting and support. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

NetSuite (NYSE:N) is a cloud computing company that provides small and midsize businesses with on demand Web-based business applications to run their entire company. NetSuite provides financials/enterprise resource planning (ERP) and omnichannel commerce software suites in the United States and internationally. Additionally, NetSuite offers relationship management software solutions, customer relationship management, and e-commerce solutions.

Stenography focuses on leveraging artificial intelligence to simplify coding and communication about code, operating in the technology sector. It primarily serves the software development industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

Magic provides an artificial intelligence (AI) based code production platform that helps to produce code in addition to following developers' requests. The company uses artificial intelligence to add elements to code depending on developer requests. Magic was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.
MutableAI is a CoPilot for refactoring prototype-quality Python code into highly readable production quality code. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

GitHub operates as a software development platform. It allows users to build, scale, and deliver software products. It also provides hosting, code previewing, integration, social coding, and project management services. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in San Francisco, California. In October 2018, GitHub was acquired by Microsoft.

Daytona provides development environment management solutions. The company offers an enterprise-grade platform for managing self-hosted, secure, and standardized development environments, providing solutions for development environments. It primarily sells to the software development industry. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Mintlify is an automatic code documentation engine that reads your code and safely inserts comments that put it in context. It aims to solve documentation challenges with automation. The company's system uses various technologies to read the code and generate the relevant documents to explain it. Apart from creating documentation, the system routinely scans "outdated" documentation and also detects how users interact with it to improve readability. Mintlify was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

CodeComplete focuses on providing artificial intelligence (AI)-powered development tools. The company primarily serves the enterprise software industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

These tools are integrated into various integrated development environments (IDEs) to enhance productivity for software developers. Codeium was formerly known as Exafunction, Inc.. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sacramento, California.

AI2sql offers an AI-powered SQL query builder that enables users to build SQL queries without any knowledge of SQL for beginners. Users enter a few keywords about their data and the platform automatically builds an optimized SQL query for the data. The company is based in Jacksonville, Florida.

CodiumAI operates as a company enhancing code integrity. The company offers products that plug into a developer's integrated development environment (IDE) and suggest meaningful tests for their code suite, helping developers understand how code behaves. It facilitates coding-agent, alpha-codium, codiumAI-API, and more. It primarily serves the software development industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
Warp is building a new command-line terminal that aims to make developers more productive. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

Machinet is a neural network plugin that helps users write unit tests. The platform takes the method selected and suggests the whole unit test function. The company is based in San Francisco, California.

TabbyML focuses on artificial intelligence in the technology sector. Cosine is an AI knowledge engine specializing in understanding codebases within the software development industry. Cosine's technology is designed to index and comprehend codebases on multiple levels, utilizing semantic search and other heuristics to deliver fully contextual answers and facilitate the planning and implementation of new features. Cosine was formerly known as Buildt. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Anysphere is a company focused on artificial intelligence. The company's main service is the development of tools that utilize artificial intelligence for coding. Replica Studios uses artificial intelligence to create games, films, music, and other media with access to "Replica" voice actors on demand.

Murf AI offers a digital platform providing voice-over services for text and scripts through artificial intelligence technology. Aiva Technologies offers AI solutions capable of composing emotional music. Aiva has learned the art of music composition by reading through a large collection of music partitions, written by the greatest composers in order to create a mathematical model representation of what music is.

Krisp is a software that removes background noises during calls. It filters out background sound from both the speaker's microphone and from the incoming sound on the other end of the call. It integrates with many applications and provides both a mobile and desktop version of the product.

On June 16th, 2022, VocalID was acquired by Veritone. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed. VocalID that builds a personalized digital voice to replace the generic commercial voices on speech-generating applications. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Belmont, Massachusetts.

Play.ht is an application for listening to articles using text-to-speech technologies. The company builds tools that help with converting text to audio and consuming the audio conveniently. alpaca is a photoshop plugin that combines AI image generation power with human skill. The company is based in California, United States.

The company offers a user-friendly interface with a wide range of templates for creating various visual content such as presentations, websites, social media graphics, and videos, supplemented by a large library of fonts, stock photography, illustrations, video footage, and audio clips. Canva primarily serves individuals and businesses seeking to create visual content without the need for complex software knowledge. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Surry Hills, Australia.

Napkin AI operates as a document editing platform that specializes in transforming text into visual content. The platform offers artificial intelligence (AI) powered tools that convert written content into graphics, diagrams, and video snippets, enhancing communication and idea clarity. Napkin AI primarily serves content creators, educators, and business professionals looking to augment their written materials with visual elements. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

Picsart operates as a mobile photo-editing application. The application offers tools for photo manipulation, freehand drawing, text, layout templates, and more. The company was formerly known as Socialin. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Modyfi is a design platform that specializes in providing a suite of multidisciplinary design tools for creatives in various industries. The company offers a browser-based application that enables design, animation, and image generation without the need for multiple apps. Modyfi's platform is known for its AI-powered tooling, intuitive vector editing, and non-destructive image processing capabilities, facilitating collaboration and enhancing productivity for designers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

Galileo AI creates data intelligence tools for unstructured data ML practitioners. Its AI creates high-quality UI designs from natural language, empowering people to design beyond their imagination. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Gamma offers an artificial intelligence (AI) platform enabling users to present ideas. The company helps to create a working presentation, document, or website page and also provides engagement analytics. It primarily serves the business industry. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Sacramento, California.

Notion provides a connected workspace for various tasks. The company offers services such as centralized knowledge wikis, project management, and document creation, all integrated with an artificial intelligence (AI) assistant. Notion primarily caters to sectors such as startups, remote work, education, and nonprofits. Notion was formerly known as Canopy Technologies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Poly operates as an online platform allowing users to create visual design and sound design assets. It uses artificial intelligence (AI) technology and text prompts, to create textures, graphics, and icons that match color and style. It enables users to enter a text prompt and generate customizable and commercially licensed design assets. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

Prezo is an AI-powered presentation format to share work, designed to look great on the web and mobile. It summarizes long documents into presentations, adds AI-generated images, and creates themes and layouts for slides. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

Vizcom provides tools for designers and artists. The company offers a platform that has features for prompts, live rendering, 3-dimensional paint, and drawing tools. Its platform applies machine learning to help accelerate the process by providing an automatic digital rendering tool, offers automatic color, shading, and rendering, and helps generate and explore synthesized images for creative inspiration. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Mountain View, California.

Recraft focuses on artificial intelligence and operates in the digital art and design industry. The company offers a platform that allows users to generate and edit digital graphics such as vector art, icons, and 3D images, using text descriptions and a variety of tools. Its primary customers are professionals in the design and marketing sectors. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Captions develops a social media application intended to provide creative tools to make videos pop. The company's platform provides the posting of pictures, enabling users to share a memory roll with friends. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

Runway is a machine-learning tool for creators. Its tool offers machine learning models, integration with other applications, and data training functions used for motion capture, image synthesis, and object recognition. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

Maverick operates a communication platform. The company's platform offers a range of features and tools that make it easy for businesses to create personalized video content. The company's platform allows users to choose from a variety of templates, styles, and themes to create videos that align with their brand and marketing objectives. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.
Wombo is an AI-powered lip-sync app. Take a selfie, pick a song, and let WOMBO work its magic. Available for early access.

Metaphysic builds technology and AI models that aim to create realistic and natural representations of faces, without looking cartoonish or uncanny. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in London, England.

Ozone delivers a cloud-based video editing collaboration platform. It offers a lag-free video editor in the cloud and allows users to edit high-definition footage in a reasonable way anywhere. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Movio.la is an AI video generator that can help one to take marketing text and turn it into a spokesperson video. It provides 80+ AI avatars covering different ethnicities, ages, and poses. It makes professional spokesperson videos for corporate training, marketing, e-learning, and more. It is based in San Francisco, California.
Yepic AI develops a text to video solution that will help businesses onboard, educate and engage their customers, staff, and partners without filming anything.
Tavus offers hyper-personalized AI recording that aim to help sales teams' with outreach efforts.

Google (NASDAQ: GOOGL) operates as a multinational technology company. It specializes in internet-related services and products including, online advertising technologies, search engine technology, cloud computing, computer software, and more. The company provides products such as Google Maps, Google Drive, Google Docs, YouTube, Gmail, and more. It also offers cloud services and other products such as Chromebooks, the Pixel smartphone, and smart home products, which include Nest and Google Home. It was founded in 1998 and is based in Mountain View, California
Pictory is the AI that helps produce a month of short social video posts from long-form content such as blogs, webinars in minutes.
Soul Machines is a developer of intelligent, emotionally responsive avatars that augment and enrich the user experience for Artificial Intelligence (AI) platforms.

HeyGen engages in video production, specifically in the domain of artificial intelligence. It offers a platform that allows users to generate professional videos using AI-generated avatars and voices, eliminating the need for expensive equipment and complex editing tools. HeyGen was formerly known as Surreal AI and Movio.la. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

Synthesia develops video synthesis technology that empowers video production for advertising agencies, marketing campaigns, corporate communications, and e-learning companies. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in London, U.K.

Twelve Labs provides a semantic search for videos through context-aware AI (Artificial Intelligence). Its platform uses AI to extract information from videos such as movement and actions, objects and people, sound, text on screen, and speech. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Pika Art is an idea-to-video platform operating in the creative and digital media industry. The company's main service involves transforming creative ideas into motion videos. Pika Labs was formerly known as Mellis Labs. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Silicon Valley, California.

Fliki offers an online platform and mobile application for audio and video media. Its helps users create videos from scripts or blog posts using realistic artificial intelligence (AI) voices. Fliki was founded in 2021 and is based in Middletown, Delaware.

vidyo.ai provides artificial intelligence (AI)-based video creation platform. It helps video creator to create highlight videos from their podcasts. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Bangalore, India.

EmbodyMe is the developer of Xpression, a VR app & social network platform that creates an avatar for a user from just one headshot. Then, through the use of a head-mounted display, it allows users to communicate over the internet as if they were actually talking to each other in the real world.
Hour One is a synthetic video creation platform powered by AI. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

D-ID's proprietary facial reenactment technology enables the creation of video footage, using any "driver" video to guide the movements, expressions, and speech of the target actor or still photo subject.

DeepBrain AI provides real-time video synthesis solutions in the form of both conversational and non-conversational 'AI Human', applicable to various customer-facing and presenter-led industries. For a customer-facing environment, DeepBrain AI aims to humanize its digital customer service and bridge the gap between them and its customers and increase engagement. As for the presenter-led environments, such as broadcasting and media companies, DeepBrain AI provides a non-conversational AI Human SaaS platform, which makes it easy to produce synthetic videos without the need to rent a studio. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
Colossyan is a technology company that aims to create personalized videos and software for marketing, sales and customer success.

Neosapience develops artificial intelligence-enabled technologies. It enables machines to speak in a human-like manner, featuring a greater emotional range and more personality. The company's products include TypeCast, a web service to convert text content to audio. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

Veed is a cloud-based video editing and creation platform. It allows users to create, edit, and share videos. It offers a range of tools such as video trimmer, video merger, video converter, screen recorder, and more. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Essex, United Kingdom.

Didimo automatically creates 3D virtual characters from a single photo. It creates a lifelike avatar that can speak, move, and represent the user in a 3D world. Platform agnostic and compatible with all 3D environments, the company's technology can be used in games, film, AR, VR, digital marketing and social platforms. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Leca da Palmeira, Portugal.

Inworld AI aims to provide a developer platform to create AI-powered virtual humans for immersive realities, including the metaverse, VR/AR, games, and virtual worlds. It provides the ability for partners and creators to utilize the platform to construct and deploy virtual avatars. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Mountain View, California.

Wonder Dynamics focuses on the film and entertainment industry. The company offers an artificial intelligence (AI) tool that automates the animation, lighting, and characters into live-action scenes, simplifying the process of visual effects production. Its primary customers are independent filmmakers looking to deliver visual effects on a budget. It was formerly known as Aether. It was founded in 2017 and is based in West Hollywood, California.

Layer serves as an applied-AI company that operates in the gaming industry. The company's main service is to empower game studios to create professional in-game content, marketing, and live operations art at scale. Layer primarily sells to the gaming industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

Ready Player Me provides avatar creation technology. The company offers a platform that allows developers to integrate a character creator into their games and applications, providing users with the ability to create personalized game characters. It is primarily used by developers in the gaming and application development sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.
Hypothetic develops tools and tech through artificial intelligence science and 3D graphics engineering. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Indio, California.

Flawless AI specializes in generative AI tools for the filmmaking industry, offering advanced solutions to enhance film production and distribution. The company provides software that enables cinematic lip syncing, dialogue changes, and performance editing without the need for physical reshoots, aiming to make films more immersive and accessible in multiple languages. Flawless AI's products are designed to integrate into existing film production, localization, and distribution workflows, ensuring scalability and security. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom

Leonardo.Ai provides a production suite for content creation leveraging generative artificial intelligence (AI) technologies. It builds an entire generative content production platform incorporating numerous forms of generative AI. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

DataGrid is an IT company that specializes in creative applications of AI, as well as developing or consulting on AI-related systems. The company develops Gene A.I.dols, an AI system capable of smoothly and automatically generating high-resolution, photorealistic Japanese idol faces. Using deep learning based on GANs (generative adversarial networks), the company's AI learns from a database of existing idol images and then generates entirely fictitious yet photorealistic idol faces.

MOVE AI is a technology company focused on the digital animation and motion capture industry. The company's main offering is a patented artificial intelligence software that extracts high-fidelity motion from any video, HD camera, or mobile device, enabling the transition of movement between physical and digital worlds. This technology primarily serves animators and content creators globally. It was funded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

Convai is a company that focuses on conversational artificial intelligence (AI) within the domain of virtual worlds. The company offers a service that enables characters in games and virtual world applications to have human-like conversation capabilities. This service is primarily used in the gaming, learning, and entertainment sectors. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Jose, California.

Multiverse Computing specializes in the development of quantum software. The company offers software solutions that leverage quantum computing to tackle complex problems, particularly in areas such as optimization, risk analysis, and market simulation. It serves sectors such as finance, energy, manufacturing, mobility, and cybersecurity. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Sebastian, Spain.

Spline develops design tools to create three-dimensional (3D) web experiences. The company creates and publishes 3D text, and basic geometric shapes, edit materials, import models, and control the outcome of design work. It primarily serves the technology sector. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in San Tiago, Chile.

Kaedim develops AI-enabled modeling software that rapidly converts 2D images, sketches, and photos into 3D models. The company aims to make digital 3D asset production simpler, faster, and cheaper. The company serves game development studios. Kaedim was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

Anything World provides a middleware platform that combines artificial intelligence (AI), voice computing, and 3D rendering with layers of behavioral intelligence. It enables users to request and play with any object imaginable. It offers 3D automated rigging and animation, 3D experience development, 3D assets, and more. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in London, U.K.
Latitude develops artificial intelligence-based online games. It offers virtual experiences with machine learning technology. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Dover, Delaware.

Avataar is an AI-led technology platform. The platform takes a deep learning approach to scaling commerce through immersive 3D and interactive AR, creating a more efficient and personalized shopping experience that lets shoppers find exactly what they are looking for quickly and easily. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

Mirage offers an application that uses text to describe users' commands and AI-powered platform generates 3D meshes and textures. The platform also offers features such as text prompt, API access, style matching, and asset export. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.
Luma AI is developing a neural rendering technology that makes it possible to take a small number of photos to generate, shade, and render a photo-realistic 3D model of a product.

Scenario is a company that focuses on the development of AI-generated game assets, operating within the gaming and artificial intelligence industries. The company offers a platform that allows users to create unique and style-consistent game assets using custom-trained AI models. Primarily, Scenario's services are utilized by the gaming industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Common Sense Machines provides APIs, interfaces, and open-source software to translate multi-modal inputs and experiences into a digital simulator for AI training and content creation. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

Physna is a geometric search engine. It helps businesses unlock the full potential of their third-dimensional (3D) model data through geometric search. The platform uses proprietary algorithms and advanced geometric deep learning technology to codify 3D models into detailed data that is understandable by software applications. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Columbus, Ohio.

SandboxAQ is an enterprise SaaS company that provides solutions such as post-RSA cybersecurity modules and quantum software. The platform offers solutions such as orchestration suites, discovery solutions, enterprise solutions, and crypto-agile frameworks. It caters to telecom, financial services, healthcare, the federal government, security, and other sectors. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Silicon Valley, California.

Perplexity AI focuses on artificial intelligence, specifically in the domain of answer engines. The company's main service is providing answers to queries, backed by up-to-date sources, essentially functioning as a knowledge base. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Personal AI is a company that focuses on artificial intelligence (AI) in the technology sector. The company offers a service that allows individuals or brands to create their own AI model, which uses their personal data, facts, and opinions to provide a responsive and interactive experience. This AI model, also known as a Personal Language Model, essentially acts as a digital extension of the individual or brand. The company primarily serves individuals and brands looking to create a digital representation of themselves. Personal AI was formerly known as Human.ai. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Diego, California.

Wolfram Alpha is a privately-held technology company building a computational knowledge engine (and not a search engine per the company). Wolfram Alpha generates output by doing computations from its own internal knowledge base, instead of searching the web and returning links. As of October 2010, Wolfram Alpha does not have external investors. Wolfram Alpha is affiliated with Wolfram Research.

Leena AI offers a conversational artificial intelligence (AI) platform. It offers cost optimization, digital transformation, employee onboarding, workflow automation, document management, and more. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

VoiceFlow offers a design and development platform for voice applications. The company provides teams with a drag-and-drop interface to design, prototype, and publish voice applications enabling businesses to design, build, and launch voice applications without coding. It primarily serves the technology industry. VoiceFlow was formerly known as Storyflow. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

DeepSearch Labs operates as a deep technology company. Its main offering includes a specialized search engine delivering industry-specific answers and insights, streamlining the process of finding relevant information. It quantifies trends, assesses growth and risk impacts, and provides recommendations. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.
Dust designs and deploys large language-model apps. The company helps in accelerating large language models (LLMs). It is based in Paris, France.

New Computer is a technology company that focuses on developing intelligent guides. Its main product, Dot, is designed to assist users in remembering, organizing, and navigating their lives, offering features such as memory assistance, context awareness, a dynamic user interface, personalization, proactive agency, and automations and routines. The company primarily targets individual consumers, particularly those seeking personal organization and memory assistance tools. It is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

Chai enables content creators to create AI experiences by building and deploying an AI chat box to users. The app is a messaging platform that allows users to make friends, chat, and engage with chat bots. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Newark, California.

NLX specializes in conversational AI within the customer experience automation sector. The company offers a no-code platform, conversations by NLX, which enables the creation, management, and analysis of automated multimodal conversations across various channels. NLX primarily serves enterprises looking for customer service with analytics and deployment capabilities. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.
Genei offers digital research tools that aim to help users with productivity through custom AI algorithms. The company's platform summarizes articles and analyzes research.
Metaphor is developing a search engine by teaching large language models to read and understand the entire web. The firm was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

Xembly develops an automation platform designed to automate meeting life. It handles the tasks that slow down workers, including taking meeting notes, tracking action items, setting to-do’s, scheduling meetings, and optimizing schedules. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

Lindy is an artificial intelligence (AI) assistant. It helps with all tasks, from calendar management and email drafting to contract to send, and more. Lindy was formerly known as Huddle. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in Beaverton, Oregon.

Soy LuzIA provides artificial intelligence-assisted (AI) solutions in the technology sector. It offers an AI assistant compatible with messenger applications and can help with daily tasks, answer questions, transcribe audio, provide inspiration, create images, translate languages, provide advice, and offer companionship. It primarily serves the general consumer market. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

You.com is a private search engine that summarizes the web for its users. The platform offers increased privacy, extensible apps, and personalized results through preferred sources for consumers. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

Kensho is empowering financial institutions with technology that brings transparency to markets. Kensho is pioneering real-time statistical computing systems and scalable analytics architectures-the next generation of improvements to the global financial system. Kensho harnesses massively-parallel statistical computing, user-friendly visual interfaces and breakthroughs in unstructured data engineering and predictive analytics to create the next-generation analytics platform for investment professionals. Addressing the most significant challenges surrounding investment analysis on Wall Street today-achieving speed, scale, and automation of previously human-intensive knowledge work-Kensho's intelligent computer systems are capable of answering complex financial questions posed in plain Engli

Noetica provides artificial intelligence (AI)--based technology for corporate debt transactions. The company provides a software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform that allows its customers to analyze, create, collaborate on, negotiate, and execute contracts, and turn agreements into operational business intelligence. The company's platform allows users to access publicly available data extracted from transactional documents and further allows users to upload any internal documents and auto-analyze provisions against public and private documents. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

Lemonade (NYSE: LMND) provides digital and artificial intelligence based platform for various insurances and for settling claims and paying premiums. The platform ensures transparency in issuing policies and settling disputes. Its products include Life insurance, Car insurance, Renter's insurance, Homeowner's insurance, Pet insurance, and The Lemonade Giveback. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.
Envelop Risk offers cyber underwriting services to insurance and reinsurance firms by utilizing an artificial intelligence-based simulation model.

Zest AI makes the power of machine learning safe to use in credit underwriting. Zest Automated machine learning allows lenders, including credit unions, to make better decisions and loans, increasing revenue, reducing risk, and automating compliance. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

Planck is an automated, AI-powered data platform for commercial insurance. The company connects insurers with up-to-date insights with just a business name and address. Its platform makes managing risk faster and more predictable, resulting in increased, written premium while reducing loss and expense ratios. Global carriers, MGAs, and insurtech companies leverage Plancks holistic solution for growth strategies, submission prefilling, prioritization and validation, underwriting new business, renewing existing policies, premium auditing, and more. Planck was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

Seel specializes in insurance solutions for e-commerce solutions. The company offers a range of services including return assurance, green shipping protection, on-time delivery, buyback guarantee, and extended warranty. Its services aim to protect customers from potential risks associated with their purchases, such as product returns, shipping issues, delivery delays, and product defects. Seel was formerly known as Omni. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Zesty.ai is an Artificial Intelligence-enabled building analytics platform for the property insurance industry. Insurers use the company's data insights to underwrite risk more accurately, provide consumers with a digital purchasing experience, and manage home inspections more cost-effectively. Using advancements in computer vision and deep learning, Zesty.ai extracts building characteristics from several different data sources for use in wildfire risk modeling, change detection, marketing, and more. Zesty.ai was formerly known as PowerScout. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Farsight focuses on artificial intelligence (AI) in the technology sector. It offers an automated LLM (language model) suite designed to enhance the development and production of AI systems, providing standard and custom metrics for objective evaluation and fine-tuning. The company primarily serves large organizations, offering both SaaS and on-premise solutions. It is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

Shift Technology delivers AI-native decision automation and optimization solutions built specifically for the global insurance industry. Addressing several critical processes across the insurance policy lifecycle, the Shift Insurance Suite helps insurers achieve faster, more accurate claims and policy resolutions.

Streetbeat is an investment platform providing patented quantitative strategies to retail investors and traders. Its solutions include algorithmic investing, data-driven insights, and data-driven strategies. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Palo Alto, California.
Materia offers AI accounting services that are provided to accounting services professionals. It is based in Ontario, Canada.

Enova International (NYSE: ENVA) a technology and analytics company, provides online financial services. The company offers short-term consumer loans; line of credit accounts; installment loans; receivables purchase agreements; CSO programs, including credit-related services, such as arranging loans with independent third-party lenders and assisting in the preparation of loan applications and loan documents; and bank programs comprising technology, loan servicing, unsecured consumer installment loans, and marketing services to the bank, as well as Enova Decisions, analytics as a service that enables companies to make decisions about their customers. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

EvolutionIQ offers an AI-driven claims guidance platform for insurance carriers in the world. It enables the future of claim handling for complex lines of coverage and offers a deep partnership between skilled professional adjusters. It empowered adjusters to reduce losses and expenses while delivering an enhanced claimant experience. It was formerly known as DeepFraud AI. EvolutionIQ was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

Black Ore is a company that focuses on providing transformative artificial intelligence solutions in the financial services sector. The company's main offering is an AI-powered platform that automates tax preparation for Certified Public Accountants (CPAs), enabling them to increase efficiency, reduce stress, and focus on growth. Black Ore primarily serves the accounting and tax preparation industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Austin, Texas.

Upstart (NASDAQ: UPST) is a lending platform that leverages artificial intelligence and machine learning to price credit and automates the borrowing process. In addition to its direct-to-consumer lending platform, Upstart provides technology to banks, credit unions and other partners via a "Software-as-a-Service" offering. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in San Mateo, California.

Zelros uses advanced analytics and machine learning to turn legacy enterprise data - e.g. spreadsheets, data warehouses or documents - into interactive messenger chatbots. With Zelros smart assistants, employees can now access to decision-making data faster, in natural language.

Tractable develops artificial intelligence systems for accident and disaster recovery. Its AI solutions process over $2B a year in vehicle repairs and purchases, and have been deployed by insurers across Europe, North America, and Asia, helping households recover from accidents faster.

Friss uses proprietary analytics software to provide solutions in the fields of fraud, risk, and compliance for the insurance industry. The company offers products such as underwriting insights, risk assessment at underwriting, fraud detection at claims, compliance screening, and investigations at SIU. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Utrecht, Netherlands.

Hyperplane provides a data platform that uses first-party data for hyper-personalization and machine intelligence, enabling financial institutions to target customers based on various demographic, interest, and purchase intent facets. Hyperplane primarily serves the financial industry. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Pao Alto, California.
Cape Analytics uses AI and geospatial imagery to provide instant property intelligence for buildings across the United States so insurers can more accurately assess a property's risk and value.

Basis focuses on artificial intelligence in the accounting sector. The company offers an AI platform designed to assist accounting firms with tasks such as tax research, document workflows, transaction workflows, and quality control. It was founded in 2023 and is based in New York, New York.

Zeplyn specializes in providing artificial intelligence (AI) driven solutions for the financial advisory sector. The services include automating advisor workflows, capturing client data for customer relationship management (CRM) systems, and generating structured meeting notes and follow-ups. Zeplyn primarily caters to advisory firms, broker-dealers, and private wealth banks. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

Taktile offers a platform that connects, augments, and governs data from sources including Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), customer relationship management (CRM), and events such as customer interactions and transactions. It provides consumer lending, commercial lending, and insurance underwriting solutions. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

Arturo is an artificial intelligence property analytics company that delivers structured data observations and predictions for residential and commercial properties for use in the property and casualty insurance, reinsurance, lending, and securities markets.

Guidewire Software (NYSE: GWRE) is a provider of software products for Property & Casualty insurers. Guidewire products enable insurers to engage customers, increase market share, and lower operating costs. Guidewire products include Guidewire InsuranceSuite, consisting of Guidewire PolicyCenter, Guidewire ClaimCenter, and Guidewire BillingCenter, which span the core, functional areas in insurance; and Guidewire Live, a cloud-based network connecting peer insurers, core system data, and expert tools.

Socure specializes in Day Zero digital identity verification technology. Its predictive analytics platform applies AI and ML techniques with trusted online/offline data intelligence from email, phone, address, IP, device, velocity, and the broader internet to verify identities instantly. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Incline, Village, Nevada.

Boosted.ai is a company that focuses on integrating artificial intelligence and machine learning into the investment sector. The company offers a software, Boosted Insights, which aids investment managers in enhancing their portfolio outcomes by providing deep analysis of market data and creating value in their equity portfolios. The primary customers of Boosted.ai are financial firms and investment managers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

SymphonyAI Sensa provides solutions for anti-money laundering and fraud. It specialises in financial crime and fraud prevention, KYK intelligence and AI Innovation. It innovates in machine learning, big data, machine intelligence, advanced analytics, data science, risk management, stress testing, and fintech.

Cowbell Cyber operates as a cyber risk insurance provider. The company delivers cyber insurance policies customized to the needs and identified risk exposures of each organization. It uses risk signals, artificial intelligence (AI), and technology to provide solutions to agents and brokers. It mainly serves small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). It was founded in 2019 and is based in Pleasanton, California.

Rad AI uses machine learning to automate repetitive tasks for radiologists. The companys first product automatically generates the impression section of radiology reports, customized specifically to the preferred language of each radiologist.

Pager helps consumers access, navigate, and coordinate their healthcare by instantly connecting them with their care team in a collaboration hub. Through a combination of AI-enabled communication technology and end-to-end care services, Pager delivers a personalized, seamless, and trusted care experience for consumers, empowering proactive engagement and smarter decision making. Pager partners with healthcare organizations to deliver its solution across their digital experiences to elevate the role they play in consumers' lives.

Gesund.ai focuses on the development and deployment of clinical-grade artificial intelligence within the healthcare domain. The company offers a platform that aids medical artificial intelligence developers in creating, validating, and maintaining their AI solutions to ensure compliance, efficiency, and scalability. It primarily serves the healthcare technology industry by providing AI assurance and facilitating AI research and development cycles. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

Regard uses AI to automate physician documentation, allowing physicians to spend more time with patients and optimize reimbursements. The company serves clients operating in the healthcare sector. Regard was formerly known as HealthTensor. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Los Angeles, California.
Anomaly provides technology that helps reduce unnecessary costs by identifying and preventing inaccurate healthcare payments.

Cleerly is a healthcare company that uses AI-powered imaging to analyze heart scans and whose mission is to create digital care pathways to prevent heart attacks. The company integrates clinical science with AI in order to offer clinical insights to every stakeholder in the heart care pathway. Through these data-driven solutions, it aims to provide a comprehensive solution for cardiovascular disease evaluation that offers great value to the healthcare system and improves heart health for patients at risk of heart attacks. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

Turbine provides a cell behavior simulation platform to understand the inner mechanisms of cancer. It helps the combination of bioinformatics, network medicine, and artificial intelligence to simulate interventions by screening millions of possible drug combinations on simulated cells. Turbine was founded in 2015 and is based in London, U.K.

Corti offers healthcare practitioners a voice-based artificial intelligence (AI) platform for analyzing patient interviews. It is designed to transcribe calls made to emergency medics or doctor’s offices and then automate the paperwork process. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.
Latent develops medical language models. The company analyzes electronic health record (EHR) records and surfaces relevant data. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.
Abacus Insights helps healthcare companies take data from unstandardized formats and bring it together for data science uses. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

Syapse develops software for aggregating and structuring biomedical data. It combines data intelligence, insight analytics and applied experience through healthcare organizations looking to transform patients lives using real-world evidence. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Abridge develops a fully integrated suite of AI-backed products for healthcare conversations. The company helps with everything downstream of a conversation, whether it is audio capture, transcription, summarization, EHR integration, or risk management. Its standalone and integrated solutions enable better care delivery experiences for clinicians, patients, hospitals systems, payers, telehealth companies, care management & coordination organizations, and more. Abridge was founded in 2018 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

Bayesian Health provides machine learning-driven protocols. It gives care teams actionable information in real-time to enable rapid and sustainable performance improvement. Its platform provides accurate and actionable clinical signals to empower physicians and caregivers to diagnose, intervene, and deliver care. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

Tempus builds a library of molecular and clinical data as well as a corresponding operating system for data accessibility and use. The company enables physicians to deliver personalized cancer care for patients through its interactive analytical and machine-learning platform. It provides genomic sequencing services and molecular and therapeutic data analysis to empower physicians to make real-time, data-driven decisions. It serves clients in the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

Co:Helm focuses on providing a generative artificial intelligence platform within the healthcare sector, specifically targeting payer organizations. Their main offering is a platform designed to optimize the clinical workforce, aiming to increase efficiency without increasing operational costs. The platform is used by entities responsible for the health coverage of over three million individuals. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

Imagen provides technology-enabled diagnostic solutions. It offers diagnostic care cardiology, orthopedics, and virtual access to specialists for primary care physicians (PCPs) and patients. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

Spring Health provides mental health benefits for employers. Spring Health combines a digital platform with a vetted provider network, resulting in 2X higher recovery rates, shorter recovery times, and lower healthcare costs.

Forta offers training programs to parents of autistic kids. It helps autistic children learn and develop by providing applied behavior (ABA) therapy. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Ambience operates as a healthcare company. It offers a suite of artificial intelligence-powered tools for doctors. Its products combine a blend of machine learning research, deep medical knowledge, and real-time user interfaces to ambiently support doctors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

aiberry offers an artificial intelligence platform that offers behavioral health assessments. Its Machine Learning (ML) pipelines are designed to eliminate biases, including those related to age, gender, sexual orientation, and race, helping save time for healthcare providers. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Bellevue, Washington.

Aidoc finds and flags critical findings in medical images. By automatically prioritizing urgent, life-threatening conditions like intracranial hemorrhage and pulmonary embolism, Aidoc saves lives, improves patient care and cuts waiting time for the must urgent patients down to only a few minutes. The always-on AI integrates into a radiologist's workflow, reprioritizing cases without forcing radiologists to change the way they work. Aidoc was founded in 2016 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

DeepScribe is an AI-powered scribe that captures the natural conversation between clinician and patient and automatically writes medical documentation. Using ambient AI, machine learning, and rules-based natural language processing, DeepScribe extracts medical information without dictation or vocal prompting, allowing clinicians to focus on face-to-face care instead of note-taking. The founders are Akilesh Bapu and Matthew Ko. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Iterative Health uses artificial intelligence-based precision medicine in Gastroenterology (GI), with the aim of helping to optimize clinical trials investigating the treatment of Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD). It offers advanced machine learning and computer vision to interpret endoscopic images along with other types of data, helping clinicians better assess patients with potential GI problems. The company was formerly known as Iterative Scopes, Inc and changed its name to Iterative Health, Inc. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

Navina develops an artificial intelligence (AI) platform. The company offers an AI platform that transforms unstructured health data into actionable insights, aiding physicians in assessing complex cases and improving patient care. It primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a particular focus on providers and payers. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

Fathom operates a medical coding automation platform. Its platform uses deep learning to read, structure, and understand electronic health records. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

AKASA uses machine learning to provide health systems with a single solution for automating revenue cycle operations. AKASAs expert-in-the-loop approach, Unified Automation, combines machine-learning with human judgment and subject matter expertise to provide robust and resilient automation. Unified Automation adapts to the highly dynamic nature of revenue cycle operations and is purpose-built for healthcare.

Viz.ai aims to use artificial intelligence and deep learning to automatically identify suspected LVOs (large vessel occlusion) on CTA imaging with the aim of alerting a patient's physician within minutes. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Komodo Health operates a healthcare insights platform that brings transparency and market intelligence to healthcare and life sciences. Its platform use tools and brings together data across enterprises, public domain, and proprietary sources, enabling healthcare and life science industries. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.
Human Dx is a stealth, global medical project focused on building the future of medicine.
Ezra provides early cancer detection for everyone by combining advanced medical imaging technology and Artificial Intelligence.

Syllable enables engaging, conversational experiences on a website or mobile app using artificial intelligence. The AI automates answering patient inquiries, educating patients about services, and physician referrals, collecting data through forms, and scheduling appointments. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

Biofourmis discovers, develops, and delivers clinically-validated, software-based therapeutics. Biofourmis has built Biovitals, a personalized, AI-powered health analytics platform that predicts clinical exacerbation in advance of a critical event, which is the backbone of its digital therapeutics product pipeline across multiple therapeutic areas, including heart failure, oncology, acute coronary syndrome, COPD, and chronic pain. It serves clients operating in the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

SigTuple combines artificial intelligence, robotics and data science to build smart screening solutions, to make healthcare accurate, accessible and affordable. SigTuple is building a healthier India with quality healthcare, delivered by empowered providers, to ensure standardization and scalability of cutting-edge innovations in healthcare delivery.

Sonio develops software that guides practitioners during prenatal ultrasound scans for secure prenatal screening. Its products include Sonio Diagnostics which combines a patients medical history, genetic and biological data, and ultrasound semiology to assist physicians on the path to the right diagnosis and Sonio Screening which assists sonographers during prenatal screening scans. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Paris, France.

Innovaccer is a healthcare technology company developing a data activation platform that develops a patient-centered, connected care delivery continuum. Its smart platform creates a unified patient record for the healthcare providers and payer-use to enable collaborative care delivery. The platform includes a proprietary integration and analysis engine to clean and aggregate healthcare data from sources, including electronic health records (EHRs), claims, pharmacies, hospitals, and labs. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Nabla develops a machine learning-powered care platform that allows healthcare firms to build engaging relationships with their patients and improve their health outcomes. Nabla gives doctors the tools they need to provide personalized care and empowers patients in their own care journey. Nabla was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France.

Vara designs affordable diagnostic products that utilize machine-learning workflows. It provides remote mammography reading services for those lacking the service of a radiologist. Vara also develops a platform for breast cancer screening. Vara was formerly known as Merantix Healthcare. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.
John Snow Labs is an AI company that helps healthcare and life science organizations put AI to work faster, providing a high-compliance AI platform, NLP libraries, and data market.

Xyla provides analytics and automation solutions for mobile marketers. It consolidates mobile marketing data across ad networks. It enables businesses to gather, segment, automate, and integrate ad data from multiple ad networks, automate workflows, and generate insights to optimize ad campaigns. It helps in generating insights into ad spending, clicks, conversions, retention, engagement metrics, and others. Xyla was founded in 2017 and is based in Royal Oak, Michigan.

Human Longevity is building a comprehensive database of human genotypes and phenotypes as a basis for a variety of commercialization opportunities to help solve aging-related disease and human biological decline. The company is developing and applying large-scale computing and machine learning to make discoveries from this data to generate personalized health insights. Its goal is to extend healthy human life by impacting human health and transforming the practice of medicine. Human Longevity was founded in 2013 and is based in San Diego, California.

Enlitic develops a diagnosis system that uses deep learning to analyze medical data in order to enable quick and more accurate detection of diseases that can be identified through medical images such as X-rays and CT scans.

GRAIL is a healthcare company that focuses on developing technologies for early cancer detection. Its product includes Galleri which provides multi-cancer early detection tests. The company was formerly known as PSC15. GRAIL was founded in 2016 and is based in Menlo Park, California. In August 2021, GRAIL was acquired by Illumina at a valuation of $8B.

Eleos Health is a healthcare technology. The company offers a CareOps automation platform that automates documentation and provides clinical insights, thereby reducing operational burdens for clinicians and improving the quality of care. Eleos Health primarily serves community behavioral health organizations, health plans, and digital mental health companies. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

Memora Health specializes in digitizing and automating care programs in healthcare. The company offers a platform that simplifies how patients and clinicians navigate complex care delivery, by providing intelligent triaging, remote patient monitoring, symptom management, patient education, and clinical workflow automation. It primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Clarify Health collects records of rendered healthcare in the United States for the purpose of providing more granular and precise analytics to healthcare organizations, spanning from providers to payers and life sciences. Clarify's software solutions are fueled by a patient-level data set and incorporate clinical, claim, prescription, lab and socio-behavioral determinants of health data. Its analytics platform is powered by a technology stack inspired by those used in banking and logistics and provides doctors and insurers greater visibility into cost, quality, referrals, utilization, and member risk. The company is also helping life sciences organizations analyze and integrate rich data to determine the optimal sites and designs for clinical trials as well as accelerate clinical developm

Subtle Medical provides artificial intelligence (AI)-powered image enhancement. The company develops software solutions to improve image quality, reduce image noise for the entire body, including the head, spine, neck, abdomen, and musculoskeletal regions of the body, and uses denoising to improve image quality. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

Quibim, a company with its headquarters in Valencia, Spain, provides a whole-body medical imaging analysis. Quibim products are used worldwide by a huge diversity of research and care teams. Partners use Quibim Precision, a CE-marked whole-body imaging ecosystem, for a wide range of applications from detecting a disease to tracking the efficacy of treatments. Quibim follows an AI-first approach to help detect pathologies across every body part and imaging modality, using quantitative imaging biomarkers.

Glass Health specializes in AI-powered clinical decision support within the healthcare sector. The company offers an AI platform that assists clinicians in developing differential diagnoses and drafting clinical plans. Glass Health's AI platform primarily serves the healthcare industry, enhancing clinical decision-making for medical professionals. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

LeanTaaS provides software solutions that combine lean principles, predictive analytics, and machine learning for core operational processes in hospital and infusion center operations. LeanTaaS increases patient access, decreases wait times, improves staff satisfaction, reduces healthcare delivery costs, and improves operational performance. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

Flatiron Health is a health care technology company and operator of the OncologyCloud platform. Integrating across the entire clinical data spectrum, Flatiron Health allows cancer care providers and life science companies to gain business and clinical intelligence through its web-based platform. It is based in New York, New York.

AiCure is an AI and advanced data analytics company targeting the health care industry. AiCure uses AI to see, hear and understand how people respond to treatment across clinical trials and patient care. Clinically proven to accurately measure and modify patient behavior, AiCures technologies keep patients engaged and optimized to treatment, as well as assess treatment effectiveness.

PathAI provides AI-powered research tools and services for pathology. PathAI's platform promises substantial improvements to the accuracy of diagnosis and the efficacy of treatment of diseases like cancer, leveraging modern approaches in machine and deep learning. PathAI was founded in 2016 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

Caspar is a company that focuses on healthcare technology. It offers a comprehensive care platform that uses artificial intelligence to provide 24/7 monitoring of patients' health conditions, without the need for wearables or cameras. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry, including home healthcare providers, senior living providers, and clinical care providers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Redwood City, California.

SmarterDx is a company that focuses on healthcare data and artificial intelligence in the healthcare industry. The company offers a physician-trained AI that performs a second level review of medical charts, aiming to recover revenue and quality opportunities. It uses all Electronic Medical Record (EMR) data and proprietary clinical AI to ensure complete documentation and coding of diagnoses that impact hospital revenue and quality. It was founded in 2020 and... See More

Hippocratic AI specializes in developing safety-focused generative artificial intelligence for the healthcare sector. The company offers a large language model that is designed to assist healthcare professionals by providing information and support without making diagnoses. Hippocratic AI's services are primarily utilized within the healthcare industry, enhancing healthcare access and ensuring responsible AI deployment. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

Unlearn builds machine-learning platforms to create biological digital twins for the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries. It develops generative machine learning methods to predict individual health outcomes and accelerate clinical innovation. It connects with biopharma companies and regulators to ensure its methods meet scientific and regulatory standards. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Fransisco, California.

Recursion (NASDAQ: RXRX) is a clinical-stage biotechnology company combining experimental biology and automation with artificial intelligence in a parallel system to efficiently discover potential drugs for diverse indications, including genetic disease, inflammation, immunology, and infectious disease. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Salt Lake City, Utah.

Elicit focuses on automating research tasks using artificial intelligence, operating within the domain of academic research and machine learning. The company offers services that enable users to summarize academic papers, extract data, and synthesize findings to facilitate efficient research. Elicit primarily serves researchers and academic professionals seeking to expedite literature reviews, systematic reviews, and meta-analyses. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Covina, California.

ROME Therapeutics is developing therapies for cancer and autoimmune diseases by harnessing the power of the repeatome - vast stretches of uncharted genetic material that have long been dismissed as "junk DNA". With several drug targets identified and multiple discovery programs underway, ROME is moving to leverage this new frontier in biology. To lead this exploration, ROME has assembled a team of leaders across fields including oncology, immunology, virology, and machine learning.

Color democratizes access to genetic information. The Color Test is physician-ordered and comes with complimentary board-certified genetic counseling for clients and healthcare providers. The 30-gene Color Test analyzes genes closely associated with some of the most common hereditary cancers: breast, colorectal, melanoma, ovarian, pancreatic, prostate, stomach, and uterine cancers.

Cradle focuses on the intersection of biology and artificial intelligence, operating within the biotechnology industry. The company offers a platform that aids biologists in designing improved proteins swiftly, utilizing advanced prediction algorithms and AI design suggestions. Cradle primarily serves the biotechnology sector. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Delft, Netherlands.

Potion AI is a company that focuses on artificial intelligence in the chemical formulation sector. The company offers a platform that uses AI to manage raw materials, documents, and formulas, and to answer complex questions in natural language. Potion AI primarily serves the chemicals industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

XtalPi provides quantum physic-based artificial intelligence (AI) for drug research and development. It offers accurate predictions on the physicochemical and pharmaceutical properties of small-molecule candidates for drug design, solid-form selection, and other critical aspects of drug development. XtalPi was founded in 2014 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

Moderna Therapeutics (NASDAQ: MRNA) is a biotechnology company that is focused on drug discovery and drug development based on messenger RNA. It creates synthetic mRNA that can be injected into patients to help them create their own therapies. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

PharmaTrace develops a blockchain-based ecosystem for the pharmaceutical industry. The company offers data-driven prediction and knowledge. The products include track and trace, chronic disease artificial intelligence (AI). It was founded in 2017 and is based in Munich, Germany.
Exscientia (NASDAQ: EXAI) is an AI-driven, drug discovery, and design enterprise. Exscientia aims to use AI to discover and design better quality drugs with greater efficiency.

Labviva focuses on life sciences procurement through its artificial intelligence (AI) powered digital purchasing platform. The company offers a platform that integrates with existing purchasing software, providing actionable insights for better decision-making and complete transparency in the supply chain, primarily serving the life sciences industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

Lavo Life Sciences specializes in AI-accelerated crystal structure prediction for the pharmaceutical industry. The company offers solutions that help drug development teams reduce turnaround time, minimize risk, and optimize solid-state formulations of small molecule drugs. Lavo Life Sciences primarily serves the pharmaceutical sector with its AI-powered technology. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.
insitro is a data-driven drug discovery and development company that leverages machine learning and high-throughput biology to transform the way medicines are created to help patients.

Atomwise uses deep learning neural networks to help discover new medicines. Atomwise achieves results for new drug hit discovery, binding affinity prediction, and toxicity detection. Atomwise predicts drug candidates for pharmaceutical companies, start-ups, and research institutions. It is currently using computational drug design to design drugs against COVID.

ConcertAI specializes in integrated clinical RWD, AI solutions and outcomes science with a large RWD oncology dataset. ConcertAI develops a medical research tool suite that offers care-based oncology research and data analytics.

Owkin specializes in AI technologies applied to clinical research with the aim of developing better drugs and treatments for patients. The company's purpose is to empower researchers in hospitals, universities and the biopharma industry to i) understand why drug efficacy varies from patient to patient, ii) improve the drug development process and iii) to help identify key drugs and treatments for each individual patient to improve patient outcomes.
