Eagle Alpha focuses on facilitating the overall functioning of the global alternative data market via our platform and workflow tools. Since its inception, more than 1,000 data buyers have interacted with our platform. We help them understand a vast and growing marketplace of over 1,800 alternative data products. Leading funds, private equity firms, consultants, corporates, and vendors trust Eagle Alpha as their key alternative data solution provider.

Neudata is a company that specializes in data intelligence, operating within the data industry. The company offers services such as unbiased research, expert consultancy on data sources and use cases, and a platform that connects data buyers and sellers. It primarily serves sectors that require data intelligence, including private equity, venture capital, and professional services. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

NoMad Data creates a marketplace of ideas and allow the experts in the data, the data providers themselves, to match the ideas to their data. It helps the providers to discover new use cases for data and help to find potential customers who have an identified need. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.
Dawex is a secure platform for monetization and data exchange between organizations. It allows public players and businesses to share, acquire and monetize all kinds of data without an intermediary.

Snowflake focuses on data management and analytics. It provides a platform known as the Data Cloud, which allows organizations to consolidate their data, discover and securely share governed data, and perform diverse analytic tasks. The company primarily serves businesses across various sectors that require data warehousing, data engineering, data science, data application development, and data sharing. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Bozeman, Montana.

Kpler develops proprietary technologies for systematically aggregating and processing data from multiple sources including automatic identification system (AIS) signals, satellite images, logistics and commercial reports, and governmental and shipping databases. It delivers real-time intelligence for flows, inventories, and freight across multiple commodity markets. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Brussels, Belgium.

Coin Metrics provides crypto asset market and network data. Its data empowers clients and the public to better understand, value, use, and steward open crypto networks. Coin Metrics was founded in 2017 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.
Xignite provides cloud-native, real-time, and reference market data APIs to financial services and FinTech companies allowing them to easily integrate financial data into any application.

Tink enables banks to become data-driven, capture the opportunities of open banking, and deliver a more personal, intelligent financial experience to their users. Tink provides APIs as building blocks to create banking services. The company's products include account aggregation, categorization, payment initiation, and personal finance management. On June 24th, 2021, Tink was acquired by Visa at a valuation of $2.15B.

Refinitiv provides financial markets data and infrastructure. It provides data and insights, trading platforms, and open data and technology platforms that connect a thriving global financial markets community - driving performance in trading, investment, wealth management, regulatory compliance, market data management, enterprise risk and fighting financial crime. On August 1st, 2019, Refinitiv was acquired by the London Stock Exchange Group at a valuation of $27000M.
NASDAQ (NASDAQ: NDAQ) is a provider of trading, clearing, exchange technology, listing, information, and public company services across six continents.

Kaiko provides a digital assets market information platform enhancing transparency and operational efficiency for institutional companies, DeFi participants, and Web3 enterprises. The companys product suite comprises market data, portfolio solutions, rates & indices, pricing services, DeFi data, and research covering digital assets that comprise over 95% of global traded volume. Kaiko was founded in 2014 and is based in Paris, France.

The International Monetary Fund (IMF) is an organization of 189 countries, working to foster global monetary cooperation, secure financial stability, facilitate international trade, promote high employment and sustainable economic growth, and reduce poverty around the world.

Preqin provides data and insight and access across the global alternatives market. The company offers data on private equity, venture capital, private debt, secondaries, hedge funds, real estate, infrastructure, and natural resources through a SaaS platform, mobile app, feeds, and through partner integrations. Its products include Preqin Pro, Preqin Insights, Preqin Mobile, Preqin Anywhere (API, Data Feeds & Plugins), Preqin Benchmarks, ESG Solutions, Company Intelligence, and LP & Capital Allocator Solutions (Colmore). The company was founded in 2002 and is based in London, U.K.

Signal AI offers an AI-powered business intelligence and media monitoring platform that aggregates, analyses, and provides business leaders with insights into digital, print, and broadcast media and regulatory data. Signals ML enables businesses to track the competitive landscape, changes to regulation and monitor reputationempowering them to make smarter decisions. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in London, U.K.

Sparta focuses on providing live market intelligence and forecasting in the oil trading industry. The company offers a platform that aggregates and processes trading data in real time, enabling oil traders, refiners, banks, hedge funds, and wholesalers to make informed trading decisions quickly and efficiently. Sparta primarily serves the oil trading sector. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Geneva, Switzerland.

GoQuant offers a digital asset trading infrastructure, focusing on market data and execution services within the financial sector. The company offers trade execution, private trading infrastructure, and a fixed-price fee model to facilitate efficient and secure digital asset transactions. It primarily serves financial institutions looking to enhance their trading capabilities in the digital asset markets. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Miami, Florida.

S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI) provides transparent and independent ratings, benchmarks, analytics, and data to the capital and commodity markets worldwide. The Company's divisions include S&P Global Ratings, S&P Global Market Intelligence, S&P Dow Jones Indices, and S&P Global Platts. The company was founded in 1917 and is based in New York, New York.

StockTwits is a financial communications platform for the financial and investing community. StockTwits created the $TICKER tag to enable and organize "streams" of information around stocks and markets across the web and social media. These streams provide new forms of insight, ideas, and information that are used by investors, analysts, media, and others as they research stocks and manage their investments.

SourceScrub is a market-leading platform focused on deal sourcing within the investment and financial services industry. The company provides deal-ready data, purpose-built tools, and on-demand data operations, enabling dealmakers to efficiently source private market information, manage pipelines, and synchronize investment leads. SourceScrub primarily serves sectors such as private equity, investment banking, corporate development, and consulting. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

TrueLayer offers developers an easy way to access the bank data they need to build financial apps and services, helping startups and banks alike to drive products in financial services. TrueLayer supports account verification, KYC processes, and transactional data for account aggregation, credit scoring, and risk assessment.
Cybersyn is a data-as-a-service company delivering market intelligence datasets. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

Thomson Reuters (NYSE: TRI) provides news and information for professionals in the financial and risk, legal, tax and accounting, intellectual property and science, and media markets. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

dv01 provides a data intelligence platform for accessing and analyzing loan-level data. It offers environmental, social, and corporate governance (ESG), impact intelligence, market surveillance, portfolio surveillance, credit facility management, data wrangling tool, and loan data agent for securitizations. It serves banks, investment banks, issuers, hedge funds, and asset managers. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York. In September 2022, Fitch Group acquired a majority stake in dv01. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

SmartNews is a global news discovery company that offers a news aggregation app that delivers politics, sports, world news and entertainment news. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

Crunchbase provides business information and insights on public and private companies. It offers information on investment and funding, leadership, mergers and acquisitions, news, and more. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Enigma is a New York-based Data-as-a-Service company, transforms tabular data into representations of real-world relationships, providing a source of intelligence about people, places and companies. From evaluating insurance risk to combating money laundering, Enigma connects clients' internal data assets to transform their strategies and workflows.

FactSet (NYSE:FDS) (NASDAQ:FDS) is a multinational financial data and software company that combines integrated financial information, analytical applications, and client service to enhance the workflow and productivity of the global investment community.

Intrinio makes financial data affordable and easy to access so investors can save money and make time to build something meaningful. The Intrinio Excel add-in and Google Sheets add-on allow users to pull financial data into spreadsheets. Users have the flexibility to customize the data feeds to fit their needs.
Plaid is a provider of API that power developer of financial services applications and help them connect with user bank accounts.

CB Insights is a data and SaaS company that provides data, insights, predictions, and workflow tools to enterprises to help them understand and make technology decisions. Using machine learning, CB Insights aims to extract structured data from millions of unstructured documents (media, regulatory docs) to analyze, synthesize, and visualize information on technology companies, technology markets, their investors, and the larger technology ecosystem. CB Insights was founded in 2008 and is based in New York, New York.

U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is an independent federal government regulatory agency responsible for protecting investors, maintaining fair and orderly functioning of the securities markets, and facilitating capital formation. It is based in Washington, DC.

MX offers data-driven financial solutions. The company offers solutions such as financial insights, account aggregations, money management, transaction cleansing, and more. Its solutions help with financial wellness, digital banking, payments, and lending. MX was formerly known as MoneyDesktop. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Lehi, Utah.

PitchBook Data specializes in providing comprehensive data, research, and insights for the global capital markets. Their main offerings include a suite of products through the PitchBook Platform, designed to support investment decisions and provide market intelligence. The company primarily serves professionals in the finance and investment sectors, offering tools and databases for private equity and public market analysis. It was founded in 2007 and is based in Seattle, Washington. In October 2016, PitchBook Data was acquired by Morningstar at a valuation of $225M.

Canoe Intelligence provides document and data management services. It turns unstructured alternative investment reporting documents into normalized datasets for institutional investors, allocators, and asset servicing firms. It provides cloud-based machine learning technology for document collection, data extraction, and data science initiatives. Canoe Intelligence was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

Dow Jones & Company is a News Corporation company (NASDAQ: NWS) (NASDAQ: NWSA) (ASX: NWS) (ASX: NWSLV). Dow Jones is aprovider of global business news and information services. Its Consumer Media Group publishes The Wall Street Journal, Barron's and MarketWatch. Its Enterprise Media Group includes Dow Jones Newswires, Dow Jones Factiva, Dow Jones Client Solutions, Dow Jones Indexes and Dow Jones Financial Information Services. Its Local Media Group operates community-based information franchises.

Bloomberg is a source of information for businesses and professionals. They offer information via the Bloomberg Professional service and multimedia platforms. Per the company, Bloomberg's media services also cover the world with more than 2,200 news and multimedia professionals at 146 bureaus in 72 countries. Bloomberg also operates the Bloomberg Television 24-hour network which per Bloomberg reaches more than 200 million homes. The firm also operates Bloomberg Radio services which broadcast via Sirius XM Radio and 1worldspace satellite radio globally and on WBBR 1130AM in New York. They also operate Bloomberg Markets magazine, Bloomberg Businessweek magazine and the Bloomberg.com financial news and information web site.

Databento is a platform that offers institutional-quality, live, and historical, market, and alternative data. The company provides on-demand data, data infrastructure, and live and historical data. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

World Bank, a member of the World Bank Group, is a vital source of financial and technical assistance to developing countries around the world. The bank's mission is to fight poverty with passion and professionalism for lasting results, and to help people help themselves and their environment by providing resources, sharing knowledge, building capacity, and forging partnerships in the public and private sectors.
Earnest Analytics is a data platform focused on improving the way people share and connect with their information. Earnest builds products that help people understand trends in the consumer economy.

MarineTraffic is a maritime information service used by shipping professionals to support their decisions and by maritime enthusiasts to track any ship in the world. The company is dedicated to making maritime information universally accessible. All MarineTraffic solutions are powered by data.

ICEYE provides quick-response imagery from space with microsatellites equipped with imaging radar technology. The ICEYE instrument can see through clouds, obscuring weather, and in the dark-all conditions that limit camera-based services in situations where waiting for daylight and improved weather is not an option.

EagleView is a provider of high-resolution aerial imagery, property data analytics and structural measurements for government agencies, insurance carriers, roofing contractors and energy utilities. Using patented image capture techniques, 3D aerial measurement software and machine learning processes, EagleView helps customers answer questions related to millions of properties throughout the world. With a sixty-petabyte library of oblique and orthogonal Pictometry aerial imagery and the capacity to process tens of thousands of roof measurement reports per day, EagleView enables organizations to reduce field visits and adopt faster, safer and more cost-effective workflows.

RS Metrics is a software development company. It provides satellite imagery and geospatial analytics technology intended to offer data and signals from large-scale analysis of satellite and aerial imagery. It also provides location-based sources, allowing real estate, retail, industrial metals, government, and academic researchers to obtain predictive analytics, alerts, and end-user applications for financial services decision-making. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Stamford, Connecticut.

Planet (NYSE: PL) provides daily satellite imagery and insights. It offers a digital platform that collects information about the changing planet using a fleet of compact earth-imaging satellites. It helps businesses, governments, researchers, and journalists understand the physical world and take action. It was founded in 2010 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Spire (NYSE: SPIR) is a satellite-powered data company that tackles unpredictable business challenges with truly global data solutions. By providing unique data from any point on Earth, every hour, Spire offers a competitive advantage for organizations that require insight into areas such as global trade, weather, shipping and supply chain, air-traffic control and monitoring, and maritime domain awareness.

Mobito Technology operates as a data exchange service provider. It offers a data exchange management platform. It provides data procurement, data distribution, and internal collaboration tools. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Schaerbeek, Belgium.

BlackSky is a company that focuses on providing real-time geospatial intelligence in the satellite imagery and analytics industry. The company's main services include delivering on-demand, high frequency imagery, monitoring, and analytics of critical locations, economic assets, and events on Earth. BlackSky's offerings are primarily used by government agencies, commercial businesses, and organizations worldwide. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Herndon, Virginia.

Capella Space is an aerospace and information services company. It provides earth observation data via space radar and high-resolution synthetic aperture radar (SAR) satellites regardless of bad weather and low light conditions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Synspective provides geo-solutions based on satellite imagery. The company gathers broad and high-frequency monitoring data from its own Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) satellite constellation and extracts information using machine learning technology to enable better decision-making and action by companies and governments. The information has multiple benefits such as visualization and prediction of economic activity, monitoring of terrain and structures, and immediate understanding of disaster situations.

Preligens develops pioneering technology to enhance operational decision-making to build a safer world. Its artificial intelligence solutions are based on an automated analysis of geospatial intelligence (GEOINT) workflows. 
Powering state-of-the-art Machine Learning and Computer Vision, Preligens aggregates information from multi-intelligence sources (Multi-INT) to provide its Defence and Intelligence customers with strategic knowledge regarding mission critical areas of interest ensuring a more insightful operating picture.

Qianxun SI develops ground-enhanced base stations to receive basic positioning data of Beidou satellite system (compatible with GPS, GLONASS, Galileo), and provides high-precision positioning services for different industries by using the company's own algorithms.

HawkEye 360 focuses on radio frequency (RF) data analytics in the space-based technology industry. The company operates a unique commercial satellite constellation to identify, process, and geolocate a broad range of RF signals, creating powerful analytical products by combining this data with other sources. Its products are primarily used for maritime domain awareness and spectrum mapping and monitoring. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Herndon, Virginia.

Windward is in the business of analysis to help people understand maritime risk and therefore take actions to reduce it. Combining the traditional world of shipping with the new world of data, it helps marine insurers boost profitability by quantifying dynamic risk; and enables intelligence agencies, coastguards and law enforcement to protect their national interests by revealing potential threats.

Satellogic (NASDAQ: SATL) provides high-resolution satellite imagery. The company's low-Earth-orbit satellite constellation and product platform deliver geospatial data that helps large enterprises and governments understand the physical world and take action. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Davidson, North Carolina.

FreightWaves operates as a data and content forum. It provides market participants with near-time analytics on the state of the freight market and tools that provide action-oriented outcomes. Freightwaves was formerly known as TransRisk. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Chattanooga, Tennessee.

Lusha is a company that focuses on providing B2B database services in the business leads and company contacts industry. The company offers services such as prospecting, data enrichment, and buyer intelligence, which help businesses create targeted prospecting lists, enrich their CRM data, and target buyers based on intent data. Lusha primarily sells to sectors such as sales, marketing, and recruiting. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

Ocean.io is a company that specializes in business-to-business (B2B) prospecting data and account-based marketing (ABM) targeting within the technology and data sectors. The company offers a prospecting data platform that uses artificial intelligence to help sales and marketing teams find accounts and contacts, and build hyper-targeted company profiles and segments. Ocean.io primarily serves the sales, marketing, and data sectors. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

Brew develops a strategic marketing platform. The company offers a Generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) platform that provides marketing teams with a comprehensive view of their competitors, market insights, benchmarks, and data breakdowns, as well as AI-generated content for various channels. Brew primarily serves the marketing industry. It was formerly known as Ever There. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

Cognism is an end-to-end sales-acceleration solution that provides sales organizations with a more efficient way to prospect. Delivered as a software service (SaaS), with its data asset and compliance engine, Cognism is helping to enrich CRM records, stream leads into the funnel, and is using artificial intelligence to surface opportunities and identify customer trends. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Richmond, England.

Zoom Information, dba ZoomInfo, is a subscription-based software as a service company that sells access to its database of information about business people and companies to sales, marketing, and recruiting professionals. It was acquired in Feb 2019 by DiscoverOrg which subsequently changed its name to ZoomInfo.
Melissa assists companies with data management to improve sales and marketing, reduce costs and drive business insights.

Klue's platform combines information from co-workers with bot-collected intel to create battle cards and dynamic dashboards that display competitor activity. Klue collects data and uses AI to surface competitive intelligence for businesses shared into one central location. Users share real-time intel through Klue's battlecards, newsletters, self-serve features, and integrations. Users can also track competitors with website page monitoring, keyword insights, content tracking, and news monitoring.

AroundDeal is a sales intelligence platform that provides a cloud-based solution for finding email addresses. It finds targeted contact information from a verified B2B business profile database. It offers visibility into the sales team's performance with insights. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Shanghai, China.

Acxiom is a technology firm that uses data and technology to transform marketing, providing its clients with the power to manage audiences, personalize customer experiences, and create profitable customer relationships.

Experian (LSE: EXPN) operates as a multinational data analytics and consumer credit reporting company. The company offers financial services, identity fraud and crime protection, credit reporting and services, business-to-business (B2B) account management, and more. It serves individuals, businesses, lenders, and organizations. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

Crayon offers a market and competitive intelligence platform. It enables businesses to track, analyze, and act on market movements from competitors, customers, and partners. Crayon's software-driven approach to market intelligence allows businesses to get more data, surface critical signals, and act on that intelligence in real time. It was formerly known as M80 Labs. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

UpLead is a company that focuses on providing B2B prospecting services in the data industry. The company offers a platform that provides high-quality B2B contact and company data, with features such as real-time email verification, technology tracking, and account-based marketing. It primarily serves the sales and marketing sectors of the economy. It is based in Walnut, California.

People Data Labs (PDL) offers a dataset of resume, contact, social, and demographic information for over 1.5 billion unique individuals which is delivered to developers via API. PDL has created two APIs (application programming interfaces) for accessing people-related data for developers, engineers, and data scientists. One is an enrichment API for individuals who want to add more data to their current records, as well as a search API for those who want to query PDL's whole dataset without having to host any of it themselves. Users can enter all of their search criteria and parameters to identify persons who are relevant to their project. Formerly, when doing business as TalentIQ, the company offered a recruiting data analytics platform and API used to keep candidate databases up to date.

Zignal Labs delivers data-driven insights from big data analytics, realtime media monitoring, and business intelligence. The Zignal Labs realtime platform empowers customers with the ability to spot trends, see relevant stories and insights unfold, and take action.

Quantcast offers an Internet ratings service which provides free, directly measured traffic and audience composition reports. These reports are Media Ratings Council-accredited, ensuring that your traffic data is both accurate and reliable. It launched in September 2006 to help advertisers gauge the audiences of millions of web sites while helping publishers accurately represent their sites through direct measurement.

Brandwatch is a provider of social media monitoring and analytics solutions. Global brands and agencies use Brandwatch, relying on a broad range of social coverage and highly reliable, spam-free data to monitor online conversations. As a result, organizations can glean insights around brand interests, conduct market research, predict market trends, and more actively engage influencers, customers, and prospects. On February 26th, 2021, Brandwatch was acquired by Cision. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Epsilon provides marketing solutions that integrate data, creativity, and technologies for advertisers. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Lafayette, Colorado.

Dun & Bradstreet (NYSE:DNB) provides business information and technology solutions. The Company's customers use these solutions in order to reduce credit risk, find profitable business partners, manage business relationships, and collect cash and receivables. Dun & Bradstreet's database contains information on public and private companies around the world.

Tarci is a data-focused company operating in the information technology sector. The company provides a continuous intelligence engine that generates dynamic data for small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs), offering insights into sales and marketing, customer success, and risk and underwriting. Tarci primarily serves various sectors including financial services, insurance, telecom, and retail among others. Tarci was formerly known as Leadgence. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New... See More

SafeGraph maintains the ground truth dataset for human movement across the globe. The company provides high-quality location data products to help organizations make better decisions and improve lives.

Unacast powers a network of proximity data, enabling brands and retailers to retarget customers online based on offline behavior. This gives brands and retailers the possibility to retarget their offline visitors online. In addition to giving proximity solution providers incremental revenue and new product features, ad platforms incremental revenue and new campaign possibilities, and online users more relevant communication and ads. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.
Carto is a spatial analysis platform that enables users to leverage data to optimize their business for use cases, such as risk management, behavioral marketing, and data monetization.
Esri's GIS (geographic information systems) mapping software helps you understand and visualize data to make decisions based on the best information and analysis.

DataPlor is a data intelligence firm. It connects companies with a mobile workforce, capable of collecting data and performing tasks on-site in emerging markets. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Manhattan Beach, California.

Placer.ai provides retailers with location-based insights into their audience and competition. Placer.ai provides instant access to location insights derived from the foot traffic of millions of consumers, delivering visibility into offline behavior. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Walnut, California.

Spatial provides a dynamic, human-driven layer of social intelligence for maps and navigation. The company offers solutions such as campaign strategy, mobile visitation segmentation, site selection, real-time activation, and more. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Cincinnati, Ohio.

Mapbox is a live location platform for developers. Mapbox provides a global map, real-time traffic, location search, and navigation via its APIs and SDKs. Mapbox enables enterprises to analyze their data, drone companies to publish flyovers, friends to find each other, real estate sites to visualize properties, satellite companies to process cloud-free imagery, and insurance companies to track assets.

CleverMaps is a location intelligence platform supporting the data stack ecosystem. Its map-based analytics platform enables it to solve location-related problems. It also allows data analysts to build and maintain large location intelligence projects. It primarily serves clients across retail, insurance, banking, real estate, delivery services, and more. It was formerly known as CleverAnalytics and changed its name to CleverMaps. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Brno, the Czech Republic.

Galigeo specializes in location intelligence and provides solutions that integrate geographic mapping and location-related data with key business information. The company offers a suite of products that enable organizations to gain insights, make informed decisions, and optimize business processes. These products facilitate geospatial analysis, sales territory management, and predictive modeling for various sectors, including retail, healthcare, public safety, and telecommunications. It is based in Paris, France.

Veraset is a global mobility and location data provider operating in the data services industry. The company offers raw GPS mobility data and device-level GPS point-of-interest data, which can be used to improve products, models, and make informed business decisions. Veraset primarily serves sectors such as urban planning, advertising, consulting, universities and research, retail and convenience, and finance and private equity. It is based in San Francisco, California.

Competitive Analytics Professionals specializes in providing location data and analytics for the retail and restaurant sectors. Their main offerings include comprehensive datasets for shopping centers, insights on consumer mobility, and detailed information on retail and restaurant locations. These products support businesses in market research, site selection, and competitive intelligence. It is based in Northport, Michigan.

PlaceIQ provides brands seeking to understand consumer behavior with technology that connects physical and digital activities across time, space, and mobile devices to uncover opportunities to learn and tie with audiences. The company's location-based audience platform currently provides consumer analytics and media targeting for large brands in retail, CPG, automotive, entertainment, travel and more. The company also provides Place Visit Rate (PVR), foot traffic measurement technology that gives access to granular data on consumer visitation across the entire purchase journey. On January 19th, 2022, PlaceIQ was acquired by Precisely. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

OpenStreetMap is a free editable map of the whole world. It is made by people like users. OpenStreetMap aims to allow users to view, edit and use geographical data in a collaborative way from anywhere on Earth.

Cuebiq is a location intelligence company that helps businesses glean actionable insights about real-world consumer behaviors and trends. Using its data intelligence platform, Cuebiq provides geo-behavioral insights and offline location analytics, geo-behavioral audiences for cross-platform ad targeting, and offline attribution analysis.

Radar is the location context platform powering location-based experiences for Fortune 500 companies across verticals like shopping & retail, food & dining, travel & transportation, and entertainment & sports.

Sense360 intends to help app developers interact more fully with their users by leveraging information gathered by the sensors in users' phones. On September 14th 2020, Sense360 was acquired by Medallia. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Foursquare is a local search-and-discovery service mobile app which provides search results for its users. The app provides personalized recommendations of places to go to near a user's current location based on users' "previous browsing history, purchases, or check-in history".

GIST is a data and analytics provider that focuses on measuring and quantifying impact in the environmental and social sectors. The company offers market-leading impact platforms and datasets, which provide detailed environmental and social impact data on companies, enabling them to measure and benchmark their impacts across operations, supply chains, and portfolios. GIST primarily serves financial institutions, corporates, supply chain leaders, banks, and private investors. It was founded in 2011... See More

Kayrros is an advanced data analytics company helping energy market players in making investment decisions. Kayrros extracts value from the integration of alternative and market data into its product offerings across the energy chain. It develops predictive analytics products combining machine learning and advanced mathematics with petroleum and financial engineering to bring transparency to the energy markets. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

MSCI (NYSE: MSCI) provides research-driven insights and tools for institutional investors. MSCI specializes in the areas of risk and performance measurement that is based on academic research, real-world experience and collaboration with clients. MSCI's products include indices and portfolio risk and performance analytics for use in managing equity, fixed income and multi-asset class portfolios.

Sustainalytics is an independent ESG and corporate governance research, ratings, and analysis firm supporting investors around the world with the development and implementation of responsible investment strategies. With offices globally, Sustainalytics partners with institutional investors who integrate environmental, social, and governance information and assessments into their investment processes. On April 21, 2020, Sustainalytics was acquired by MorningStar at a valuation of $98.83M.

Watershed develops an enterprise climate platform. The company provides tools for businesses to measure, report, and reduce their greenhouse gas emissions, enabling them to run effective sustainability programs. It primarily serves businesses across various industries aiming to reduce their environmental impact. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Arcadia works with local utilities and Green-E-certified wind farms across the country to give users access to clean energy. The company's Arc platform combines data and APIs under one roof to allow any company to act on its environmental impact and build energy products and climate tech solutions. Arcadia Power gives users the opportunity to support clean energy generation through monthly home electricity bills. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Washington, D.C.

Clarity is an enterprise SaaS tool for asset managers that visualizes and optimizes the social impact of their investment portfolios. Clarity tries to solve the problem of inefficient and unequal allocation of capital by developing a universal framework and an automated tool that can be readily applied to rate companies, projects, governments and NGOs.

ESG Analytics provides an AI-powered ESG data, analytics, and research platform that uses alternative data to measure ESG practices. Its platform enables researchers, analysts, funds, and companies to get new and timely insights as they integrate ESG as part of the investment management process and company decision-making. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
Novisto provides end-to-end enterprise software for smarter corporate sustainability management, empowering companies to create value from their ESG strategy, data, and reporting.

ESG Book provides a cloud-based platform that makes ESG data accessible, enabling financial markets to allocate capital towards more sustainable and higher impact assets. Covering companies globally, ESG Book enables clients to be custodians of their own data, provides framework-neutral sustainability information in real-time, and promotes transparency. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.
RepRisk is a web-based tool which provides insights on environmental and social issues that present financial and reputational risks to a company or investment portfolio.

OWL ESG is a company that focuses on providing environmental, social, and governance (ESG) solutions in the financial services industry. The company offers a range of services including data gathering, analysis, and application of ESG data, providing clients with insights on various ESG issues such as emissions, waste, and diversity. This information aids in making informed investment decisions. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

TruValue Labs is a provider of real-time sustainability data analytics for investors, financial institutions, and corporations globally. The company is the developer of Insight360, an artificial intelligence engine that identifies a company's ESG performance trajectory so users can make informed investment decisions. The platform offers solutions for asset managers, asset owners, wealth managers, and research analysts. On October 20, 2020 TruValue Labs was acquired by FactSet. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Nossa Data is a technology company focused on supporting companies with their environmental, social, and governance (ESG) data management, analytics, and reporting. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

International Shareholder Services (ISS) provides proxy advisory and corporate governance solutions to financial market participants. ISS's services include objective proxy research and analysis, end-to-end proxy voting and distribution solutions, securities class-action claims management, and governance data and modeling tools. Clients use ISS services to help them make informed corporate governance decisions. On November 17th, 2020, Deutsche Borse acquired a majority stake in International Shareholder Services at a valuation of $1.82B.

KPMG is a professional services firm that operates in the audit, tax, and advisory sectors. The company provides a range of services including auditing, tax consulting, and business advisory services. KPMG primarily serves a wide range of industries, from banking and capital markets to government and life sciences. It was founded in 1987 and is based in Amstelveen, Netherlands.

Upright Analytics focuses on creating data solutions within the analytics and business intelligence sectors. The company offers services that analyze and interpret data to support businesses in making informed decisions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

McKinsey & Company is a global management consulting firm. It offers consultation to various industries such as electronic, aerospace, automotive, chemical, financial, oil and gas, public sector, and healthcare. The company was founded in 1926 and is based in New York, New York.

InData Labs is a provider of AI services, specializing in data science, big data analytics, AI, computer vision, business intelligence, and machine learning. The company's solutions aim to help clients automate business processes, add AI-powered features, and gain competitive advantage.

ZS Associates helps companies to improve overall performance and grow revenue and market share through end-to-end sales and marketing solutions-from customer insights and strategy to analytics, operations, and technology. It uses analytics, data, science, and products to help clients make decisions, deliver solutions and improve outcomes. The firm was founded in 1983 and is based in Evanston, Illinois.

Deeper Insights is a partner for building AI solutions for large enterprise and scale-up clients, a suite of AI models, and data visualisation dashboards that enable you to quickly analyse and share insights.

3Pillar Global develops software products to help in business growth. The company's software product development services include product strategy development, product design, product development, and product support. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Fairfax, Virginia.
phData is a provider of Big Data services including Hadoop, Spark and Kafka. phData partners with customers to provide architecture, development and managed services for Big Data applications.

Analytics8 is a data and analytics consulting firm that specializes in data strategy and business intelligence implementations. It helps organizations make smart, data-driven decisions by translating their data into meaningful information. It caters to Finance, Healthcare, Insurance, Manufacturing, Private Equity, Retail, Supply Chain, and Human Resources. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

Aimpoint Digital specializes in data analytics and decision sciences within the consulting sector. The company offers a range of services including analytics, decision sciences, data engineering and infrastructure, and strategic planning to drive business decisions and efficiency. Aimpoint Digital primarily serves sectors that require advanced data solutions and strategic insights, such as manufacturing, healthcare, and finance. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Sarasota, Florida.

Deloitte provides audit and assurance, consulting, financial advisory, risk advisory, tax, and related services. It primarily serves the consumer, energy, life sciences and health care, technology, media, telecommunications, and other industries. It was founded in 1845 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

DAS42 provides cloud-based data analytics consulting and professional services. The company helps Fortune 500 companies access and understand all of their data, reduce the time to actionable insights, and empower organizations to make better decisions faster. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

The Boston Consulting Group is a management consulting and advisory firm. The Company specializes in education, biopharmaceuticals, automotive, energy, financial, insurance, media, technology, mining, private equity, process industries, social impact, telecommunication, transportation, and tourism consulting services. It caters to clients from the private, public, and not-for-profit sectors and industries such as aerospace and defense, the automotive industry, consumer products, education, financial institutions, health care, oil, gas power, utilities, and more. The company was founded in 1963 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

FluenFactors operates as a data strategy professional services company that specializes in data-driven business growth and opportunity unlocking. The company offers services such as data strategy assessment, data architecture design, data modeling, intelligence forecasting, and data team building to organize and activate data for actionable insights. FluenFactors primarily serves sectors that require robust data strategy and analytics, such as financial services, healthcare, and technology industries. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Orlando, Florida

Leit Data specializes in data solutions and operates within the data consultancy and services industry. The company offers a range of services including data strategy development, maturity assessments, cloud architecture, and managed data services. Leit Data primarily serves sectors such as financial technology, retail, pharmaceutical, insurance, and education, among others. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Middlesex, United Kingdom.

Onica operates a cloud consulting and managed services company that helps businesses enable, operate, and innovate on the cloud, from migration strategy to operational excellence and transformation. On November 4, 2019 Onica was acquired by Rackspace, the terms of the agreement were not disclosed.

Bytecode IO operates as a consulting company specializing in data analytics and business intelligence solutions within the cloud computing industry. The company offers services such as solution architecture, data engineering, Looker development, and application integration to optimize data warehousing and analytics. Bytecode IO primarily serves clients requiring advanced data analysis and business intelligence capabilities. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Walnut Creek, California.

System2 specializes in providing custom data solutions across various business sectors, including finance, legal, and insurance. The company offers a range of services such as bankruptcy litigation analysis, investment return analysis, and revenue growth strategies, all tailored to the specific needs of their clients. System2 primarily serves sectors such as hedge funds, private equity, corporates, and legal entities. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Pittsford, New York.

Itrex is a global technology consulting and enterprise software development company providing IT consulting and enterprise software solutions. Its industry-specific expertise includes IT solutions for: healthcare & biotech, retail & e-commerce, education, and logistics & transportation.

DataRoot Labs is a data science and artificial intelligence (AI) consulting company focused on AI solutions development and research and development (R&D) services for data science and AI-powered startups. The company offers a range of services including AI consulting, machine learning model development and training, solution architecture design, and system deployment and monitoring. DataRoot Labs also provides dedicated AI and ML teams and supports startups with venture services such as fundraising and investor outreach. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Kyiv, Ukraine.

Azati designs and develops software for clients in a diverse set of industries including entertainment, education, finance, insurance, medical services and biotechnology. The company provides services including web development, mobile development, big data, machine learning, business intelligence, enterprise content management, and additional services. It is based in Livingston, New Jersey.

CapTech is a national management consulting firm that bridges the gap between business and technology. CapTech delivers transformation, customer engagement, data & analytics and custom IT solutions for private companies, public companies and government agencies. The company's collaborative approach helps organizations grow their business, engage with customers and turn information into powerful data assets.

Big Time Data specializes in data analytics and business process automation within the technology sector. The company offers a suite of services including self-service analytics, a customer data platform, go-to-market automation, and business operations architecture to facilitate data-driven decision-making and operational efficiency. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.
Slalom is a consulting firm that helps companies solve business problems with solutions spanning business advisory, customer experience, technology, and analytics.

NTT Data (TYO: 9613) provides global IT services. It offers consulting, application development, business process, cloud, and infrastructure services to businesses and governments worldwide. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

On the Mark Data specializes in content creation and advisory services within the data industry. The company offers technical content discovery and personalized consulting to address various data-related topics. Its primary clientele includes brands looking to engage with data professionals. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Palo Alto, California.
Kubrick is a data consultancy that specializes in data, data engineering, data management, and data products. It is based in London, England.

Tribe AI is an advanced engineering firm. It specializes in AI, data, and machine learning. It helps organizations of all sizes leverage the power of artificial intelligence. The company leverages its expertise to transform business problems into high-impact, data-backed solutions and takes on the full life cycle of any machine learning project, from strategy to deployment. It is based in Brooklyn, New York.

Ernst & Young is a provider of assurance, tax, transaction, and advisory services. The company offers assurance, audit, tax, financial, and business advisory services to automotive, financial, government, entertainment, mining, real estate, technology, and telecommunication industries. EY serves customers worldwide. It was founded in 1890 and is based in London, U.K.

Brooklyn Data Co. is a full-stack data and analytics consultancy that focuses on leadership, process improvement, implementation, and advanced analytics. It helps organizations manage, understand, and act on data. It serves e-commerce, retail, healthcare and life sciences, nonprofit organizations, and other industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

Ternary Data operates as a boutique firm specializing in data engineering consulting within the technology sector. The company offers services such as data architecture design, implementation of data solutions, and enhancement of data team skills. Ternary Data primarily serves businesses looking to improve their data systems and practices. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Salt Lake City, Utah.

DataCaptains primarily serves clients looking to enhance their data-driven decision-making capabilities through technology. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

Markovate primarily serves sectors such as healthcare, financial technology, retail, travel, fitness, and software-as-a-service (SaaS).
